  6765                                  		;mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx] ; wrong ! 14/08/2023
  6766                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6767                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ (SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG<<4)
  6768                                  							; correct offset
  6769 00001F3A 8BB7[AC85]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  6770                                  
  6771                                  		; 28/08/2023
  6772 00001F3E 81C6D03B                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  6773                                  set_recbpb:				
  6774 00001F42 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  6775                                  					; es:di -> recbpb
  6776 00001F45 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  6777 00001F48 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes
  6778                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  6779 00001F4A 5F                      		pop	di
  6780 00001F4B 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  6781 00001F4C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  6782 00001F4F 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  6783 00001F52 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  6784 00001F54 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  6785                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6786                                  
  6787                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6788                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  6789                                  		;retn
  6790                                  
  6791                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6792                                  
  6793                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6794                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6795                                  
  6796                                  ; al = device number
  6797                                  
  6798                                  print_init:	
  6799 00001F57 98                      		cbw
  6800 00001F58 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  6801 00001F5A B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  6802 00001F5C CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  6803                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  6804                                  					; Return: AH = status
  6805                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  6806 00001F5E C3                      		retn
  6807

  6809

  6816                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  6817                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  6818                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6819 00001F62 B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  6820 00001F65 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  6821                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  6822                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  6823                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,

  6825 00001F67 C3                      		retn

  6828                                  
  6829                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6830                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6831                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  6832                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  6833                                  
  6834                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  6835                                  ;
  6836                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  6837                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  6838                                  ;
  6839                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  6840                                  ;
  6841                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  6842                                  ;   initialize it.
  6843                                  ;
  6844                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  6845                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  6846                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  6847                                  ;
  6848                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  6849                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  6850                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  6851                                  ;
  6852                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  6853                                  ;   save coding.
  6854                                  ;
  6855                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  6856                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  6857                                  ;
  6858                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  6859                                  ;
  6860                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  6861                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  6862                                  ;
  6863                                  ; called modules:
  6864                                  ;		  getboot
  6865                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  6866                                  ;
  6867                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  6868                                  ;
  6869                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  6870                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  6871                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  6872                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  6873                                  ;
  6874                                  ;******************************************************************************
  6875                                  
  6876                                  		; 19/10/2022
  6877                                  domini:	
  6878 00001F68 8A36[FD15]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  6879                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6880 00001F6C 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  6881                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  6882 00001F6E 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  6883 00001F70 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  6884                                  domini_loop:				
  6885 00001F72 52                      		push	dx
  6886 00001F73 8816[FC15]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  6887 00001F77 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6888 00001F79 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6889                                  					; DL = drive number
  6890                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6891                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6892                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6893                                  		
  6894                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  6895                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  6896                                  		;inc	dh
  6897                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  6898                                  		;mov	al, dh
  6899 00001F7B 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  6900 00001F7D 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  6901 00001F7F 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  6902 00001F80 A3[0216]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  6903                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  6904                                  		;mov	al, cl
  6905                                  		; 08/08/2023
  6906 00001F83 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  6907 00001F85 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  6908 00001F88 A3[0416]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  6909 00001F8B 06                      		push	es
  6910 00001F8C 8A16[FC15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6911 00001F90 E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  6912                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  6913 00001F93 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  6914 00001F95 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  6915                                  domininext:				
  6916 00001F98 07                      		pop	es
  6917 00001F99 5A                      		pop	dx
  6918 00001F9A FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  6919 00001F9C FECE                    		dec	dh
  6920 00001F9E 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  6921                                  dominiret:				
  6922 00001FA0 C3                      		retn
  6923                                  
  6924                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6925                                  
  6926                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6927                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6928                                  
  6929                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  6930                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  6931                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  6932                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  6933                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  6934                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  6935                                  ;
  6936                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  6937                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  6938                                  
  6939                                  find_mini_partition:	
  6940 00001FA1 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  6941                                  fmpnext:				
  6942 00001FA5 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  6943 00001FA9 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  6944 00001FAB 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6945 00001FAE 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6946 00001FB2 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  6947                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  6948                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6949                                  fmpnextfound:
  6950 00001FB4 C3                      		retn
  6951                                  
  6952                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  6953                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  6954                                  ;fmpret:
  6955                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  6956                                  
  6957                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6958                                  
  6959                                  		; 19/10/2022
  6960                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  6961 00001FB5 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  6962 00001FB8 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  6963 00001FBA 8B3E[0016]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  6964 00001FBE C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  6965                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6966 00001FC3 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  6967                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6968                                  					; fNon_Removable
  6969 00001FC7 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6970                                  					; ffHardFile
  6971 00001FCB C606[8615]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  6972 00001FD0 A1[0216]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  6973 00001FD3 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  6974 00001FD6 A1[0416]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  6975 00001FD9 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6976 00001FDC A0[FC15]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6977 00001FDF 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6978                                  					; set physical number
  6979 00001FE2 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  6980 00001FE5 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6981                                  					; set logical number
  6982 00001FE8 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  6983 00001FED 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  6984 00001FEF 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  6985                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  6986 00001FF4 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  6987                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  6988                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  6989 00001FF6 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  6990 00001FF9 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  6991 00001FFD 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  6992 00002000 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  6993 00002002 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  6994 00002004 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  6995 00002008 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  6996                                  					; set hidden trks
  6997 0000200B 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  6998 0000200F 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  6999 00002013 8A16[FC15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7000 00002017 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7001 0000201A B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7002 0000201D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7003                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7004                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7005                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7006 0000201F 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  7007 00002021 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7008                                  
  7009                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7010                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7011 00002024 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7012 0000202A 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7013                                  
  7014                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7015                                  		;push	es
  7016 0000202C E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7017                                  					; bx value saved.
  7018                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7019 0000202F 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7020 00002031 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7021                                  fmpnextchain:
  7022 00002034 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7023                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7024                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7025                                  
  7026                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7027                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7028                                  		;retn
  7029                                  
  7030                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7031                                  
  7032                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7033                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7034                                  
  7035                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7036                                  	
  7037 00002037 57                      		push	di
  7038 00002038 53                      		push	bx
  7039                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7040                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7041                                  		;push	ds
  7042 00002039 06                      		push	es
  7043                                  setmini_1:				
  7044 0000203A 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7045 0000203E 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7046 00002040 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7047 00002044 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7048 00002046 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7049 0000204A 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7050 0000204C 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7051 0000204F 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7052 00002053 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7053 00002055 F9                      		stc
  7054 00002056 07                      		pop	es
  7055                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7056                                  		;pop	ds
  7057 00002057 5B                      		pop	bx
  7058 00002058 5F                      		pop	di
  7059 00002059 C3                      		retn
  7060                                  
  7061                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7062                                  setmini_2:
  7063 0000205A E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7064                                  
  7065                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7066                                  
  7067                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7068                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7069                                  ;
  7070                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7071                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7072                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7073                                  ;
  7074                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7075                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7076                                  ;			trash ax
  7077                                  
  7078                                  dmax_check:
  7079 0000205D 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7080 00002062 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; returns with carry if okay
  7081 00002064 06                      		push	es
  7082                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7083 00002065 B82D04                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7084 00002068 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7085                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7086 0000206A 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7087                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7088                                  					; set message flag
  7089                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7090 00002070 07                      		pop	es
  7091                                  
  7092                                  		;;push	es
  7093                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7094                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7095                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7096                                  					; set message flag
  7097                                  		;;pop	es
  7098                                  		;
  7099                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7100                                  dmax_ok:
  7101 00002071 C3                      		retn
  7102                                  
  7103                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7104                                  
  7105                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7106                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7107                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7108                                  ;								 
  7109                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7110                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7111                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7112                                  
  7113                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7114 00002072 56                      		push	si
  7115 00002073 53                      		push	bx
  7116 00002074 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7117                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7118 00002078 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7119 0000207B 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ; skip ahead if so
  7120                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7121 0000207D 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7122 0000207F EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7123                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7124                                  
  7125                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7126                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7127 00002081 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7128                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7129 00002083 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7130                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7131 00002086 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7132                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7133 0000208A 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7134                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7135                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7136 0000208D 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7137 00002090 8B36[FE15]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7138 00002094 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7139 00002096 8306[FE15]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7140 0000209B FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7141 0000209F 8306[0016]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7142 000020A4 5B                      		pop	bx
  7143 000020A5 5E                      		pop	si
  7144 000020A6 C3                      		retn
  7145                                  
  7146                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7147                                  
  7148                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7149                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7150                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7151                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7152                                  
  7153                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7154 000020A7 50                      		push	ax
  7155 000020A8 51                      		push	cx
  7156 000020A9 52                      		push	dx
  7157 000020AA 55                      		push	bp
  7158 000020AB 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7159                                  loop_clock:				
  7160 000020AD 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7161 000020AF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7162 000020B1 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7163 000020B3 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7164                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7165                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7166                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7167 000020B5 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7168 000020B8 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7169 000020BA 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7170 000020BD 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7171 000020BF 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7172 000020C2 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was at zero setting.
  7173 000020C4 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7174 000020C5 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7175                                  delay:					
  7176 000020C8 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7177 000020CA EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7178                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7179                                  
  7180                                  clock_present:				
  7181 000020CC 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7182 000020D2 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7183                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7184                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7185 000020D5 56                      		push	si
  7186 000020D6 E81CF3                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7187 000020D9 FA                      		cli
  7188                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7189 000020DA 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7190 000020DE FB                      		sti
  7191 000020DF 5E                      		pop	si
  7192                                  
  7193                                  no_readdate:				
  7194 000020E0 5D                      		pop	bp
  7195 000020E1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7196 000020E2 59                      		pop	cx
  7197 000020E3 58                      		pop	ax
  7198 000020E4 C3                      		retn
  7199                                  
  7200                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7201                                  
  7202                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7203                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7204                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7205                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7206                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7207                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7208                                  ;
  7209                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7210                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7211                                  ;
  7212                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7213                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7214                                  ;
  7215                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7216                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7217                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7218                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7219                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7220                                  ;
  7221                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7222                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7223                                  
  7224                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits
  7225                                  
  7226                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7227                                  
  7228                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7229                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7230                                  			
  7231 000020E5 50                      		push	ax
  7232 000020E6 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7233 000020EC 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7234 000020EE 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7235                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7236 000020F4 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
  7237 000020F6 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7238                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7239 000020FC 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
  7240                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
  7241                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7242                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
  7243                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
  7244                                  cmosck4:				
  7245 000020FE B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7246                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7247 00002100 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7248                                  					; Set divider & rate selection
  7249 00002102 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7250 00002105 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7251                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7252 00002107 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7253 0000210A 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7254                                  					; clear SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7255 0000210C 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7256 0000210E B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7257                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7258 00002110 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7259                                  cmosck9:				
  7260 00002113 58                      		pop	ax
  7261 00002114 C3                      		retn
  7262                                  
  7263                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7264                                  
  7265                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7266                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7267                                  ;									       :
  7268                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7269                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7270                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7271                                  ;									       :
  7272                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7273                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7274                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7275                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7276                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7277                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7278                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7279                                  
  7280                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7281 00002115 9C                      		pushf
  7282 00002116 FA                      		cli
  7283 00002117 53                      		push	bx
  7284 00002118 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be read
  7285 00002119 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7286 0000211B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7287                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7288 0000211D 90                      		nop			; (undocumented delay needed)
  7289 0000211E E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7290 00002120 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7291 00002122 58                      		pop	ax
  7292 00002123 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7293 00002125 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7294 00002127 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7295                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7296 00002129 90                      		nop
  7297 0000212A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7298 0000212C 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7299 0000212E 5B                      		pop	bx
  7300 0000212F 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7301 00002130 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7302 00002133 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7303                                  
  7304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7305                                  
  7306                                  cmos_popf:				
  7307 00002134 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7308                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7309                                  
  7310                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7311                                  
  7312                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7313                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7314                                  ;									       :
  7315                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7316                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7317                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7318                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7319                                  ;									       :
  7320                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7321                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7322                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7323                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7324                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7325                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7326                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7327                                  
  7328                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)
  7329 00002135 9C                      		pushf			;
  7330 00002136 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7331 00002137 FA                      		cli
  7332 00002138 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7333 00002139 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7334 0000213B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7335                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7336 0000213D 90                      		nop
  7337 0000213E 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7338 00002140 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7339 00002142 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7340 00002143 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7341 00002145 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7342 00002147 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7343                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7344 00002149 90                      		nop
  7345 0000214A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7346 0000214C 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7347 0000214D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7348 0000214E E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7349 00002151 C3                      		retn
  7350                                  
  7351                                  ; 21/12/2022
  7352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7354                                  %if 0
  7355                                  
  7356                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7357                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7359                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7361                                  
  7362                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7363                                  ;
  7364                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7365                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7366                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7367                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7368                                  
  7369                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7370                                  
  7371                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7372                                  ;
  7373                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7374                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7375                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7376                                  
  7377                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7378                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7379                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7380                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7381                                  
  7382                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7383                                  getclus:				
  7384                                  		push	cx
  7385                                  		push	di
  7386                                  		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7387                                  		mov	ax, bx
  7388                                  		dec	ax
  7389                                  		dec	ax
  7390                                  		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7391                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7392                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7393                                  		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7394                                  		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7395                                  unpack:					
  7396                                  		push	ds
  7397                                  		push	ax
  7398                                  		push	bx
  7399                                  		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7400                                  		mov	ds, si
  7401                                  		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7402                                  		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7403                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7404                                  		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7405                                  		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7406                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7407                                  		add	si, bx		;
  7408                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7409                                  		push	dx
  7410                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7411                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7412                                  		pop	dx
  7413                                  		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7414                                  		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7415                                  		; 25/06/2023	
  7416                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7417                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7418                                  		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7419                                  		push	dx
  7420                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7421                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7422                                  		pop	dx
  7423                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7424                                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7425                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7426                                  		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7427                                  even_odd:				
  7428                                  		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7429                                  		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7430                                  		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7431                                  		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7432                                  		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7433                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7434                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7435                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7436                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7437                                  havclus:				
  7438                                  		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7439                                  		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7440                                  		jmp	short unpackx
  7441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7442                                  
  7443                                  unpack16:				
  7444                                  		push	dx
  7445                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7446                                  		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7447                                  		adc	dx, 0
  7448                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7449                                  		pop	dx
  7450                                  		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7451                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7452                                  unpackx:				
  7453                                  		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7454                                  		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7455                                  		pop	ds
  7456                                  		sub	si, bx
  7457                                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7458                                  		jnz	short getcl2
  7459                                  		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7460                                  		jmp	short unpack
  7461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7462                                  
  7463                                  getcl2:					
  7464                                  		push	bx
  7465                                  		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7466                                  		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7467                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7468                                  		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7469                                  		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7470                                  		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7471                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7472                                  		push	ds
  7473                                  		push	cs
  7474                                  		pop	ds
  7475                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7476                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7477                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7478                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7479                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7480                                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7481                                  		pop	ds
  7482                                  		pop	bx
  7483                                  		pop	di
  7484                                  		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7485                                  		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7486                                  		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7487                                  		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7488                                  		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7489                                  		retn
  7490                                  
  7491                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7492                                  
  7493                                  
  7494                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7495                                  ;
  7496                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7497                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7498                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7499                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7500                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7501                                  ;
  7502                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7503                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7504                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7505                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7506                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7507                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7508                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7509                                  
  7510                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7511                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7512                                  		push	ax
  7513                                  		push	cx
  7514                                  		push	di
  7515                                  		push	si
  7516                                  		push	es
  7517                                  		push	ds
  7518                                  		mov	ax, si
  7519                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7520                                  		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7521                                  		nop
  7522                                  
  7523                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7524                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7525                                  
  7526                                  		push	es
  7527                                  		push	ds
  7528                                  		push	di
  7529                                  		push	ax
  7530                                  		push	cs
  7531                                  		pop	ds
  7532                                  
  7533                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7534                                  		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7535                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7536                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7537                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7538                                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7539                                  		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7540                                  		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7541                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7542                                  		pop	di
  7543                                  		pop	ds
  7544                                  		pop	es
  7545                                  		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7546                                  		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7547                                  		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7548                                  					; sector number
  7549                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7550                                  		push	dx
  7551                                  		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7552                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7553                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7554                                  		mov	dx, ax
  7555                                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7556                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7557                                  		push	ds
  7558                                  		pop	es
  7559                                  		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7560                                  		push	ds
  7561                                  		push	cs
  7562                                  		pop	ds
  7563                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7564                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7565                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7566                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7567                                  		call	call_bios_code
  7568                                  		pop	ds
  7569                                  		pop	dx
  7570                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7571                                  
  7572                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7573                                  		dec	cx		; 511
  7574                                  		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7575                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7576                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7577                                  		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7578                                  		pop	ds
  7579                                  		pop	es
  7580                                  		pop	si
  7581                                  		pop	di
  7582                                  		pop	cx
  7583                                  		pop	ax
  7584                                  		retn
  7585                                  
  7586                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7587                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7588                                  
  7589                                  %endif
  7590                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7591                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7592                                  
  7593                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7594                                  		;db 0
  7595

  7597                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7598                                  
  7599                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  7600 00002152 00<rep Eh>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7601                                  %endif

  7604

  7606                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF equ $ - BData_start
  7607                                  ; 29/09/2023

  7609                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7610

  7612                                  S1SIZE equ $-$$

  7627                                  
  7628                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022

  7635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7636                                  
  7637                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7638 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7639 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7640                                  
  7641                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7642                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7643                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7644                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7645                                  
  7646                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7647                                  
  7648                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7649                                  
  7650                                  ;************************************************************************
  7651                                  ;*									*
  7652                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7653                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7654                                  ;*									*
  7655                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7656                                  ;*									*
  7657                                  ;************************************************************************
  7658                                  
  7659                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  7660                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7661                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  7662                                  
  7663                                  _seg_reinit:
  7664 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7665                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7666                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7667 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7668                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7669                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7670                                  		; 10/08/2023
  7671 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  7672                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  7673 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7674 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7675 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7676 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7677                                  
  7678                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  7679                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  7680                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  7681                                  		
  7682                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7683 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  7684                                  		
  7685 00000046 CB                      		retf
  7686                                  
  7687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7688                                  
  7689                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7690                                  
  7691                                  ;************************************************************************
  7692                                  ;*									*
  7693                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7694                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7695                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7696                                  ;*									*
  7697                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7698                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7699                                  ;*									*
  7700                                  ;************************************************************************
  7701                                  
  7702                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7703 00000047 56                      		push	si
  7704 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  7705 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  7706 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  7707 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  7708 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  7709 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  7710 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  7711 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  7712 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7713 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7714                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7715                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7716 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7717                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  7718 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  7719                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7720 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  7721 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7722 00000061 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7723                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7724 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7725 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7726 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7727 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7728 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7729                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7730 00000079 81FE[3805]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7731                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7732                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7733                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7734 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7735                                  
  7736                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7737                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7738                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7739                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7740                                  ;
  7741                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7742                                  ;
  7743                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7744                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7745                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7746                                  ;
  7747                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7748                                  
  7749                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7750                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7751 0000007F C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7752 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7753 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7754 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7755                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7756                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7757 0000008E 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7758 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7759                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7760                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7761 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7762 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7763 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  7764 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  7765 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7766 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7767 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7768 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7769 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7770 000000AA FC                      		cld
  7771                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7772 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7773                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7774 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7775 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7776                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7777                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  7778                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7779                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7780 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7781                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7782 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7783 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7784                                  					; mark operation complete
  7785 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  7786 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  7787 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7788 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  7789 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  7790 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  7791 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  7792 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  7793 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  7794                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7795                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  7796 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  7797 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  7798                                  
  7799                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7801                                  bc_retf:
  7802 000000CA CB                      		retf
  7803                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7804                                  
  7805                                  command_error:				
  7806 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7807 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7808                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7809                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7810                                  
  7811                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7812                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7813                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7814                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7815                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7816                                  ; high.
  7817                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7818                                  
  7819                                  
  7820                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7821                                  
  7822                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  7823                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  7824                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7825                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7826                                  
  7827 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7828                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7829                                  		
  7830                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7831                                  
  7832                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7833                                  
  7834                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7835 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7836                                  					; unknown command error
  7837                                  
  7838                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7839                                  
  7840                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7841                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7842                                  
  7843                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7844                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7845                                  
  7846                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7847                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7848                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7849 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7850 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7851                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7852 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7853 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7854 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7855                                  
  7856                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7857                                  
  7858                                  ;Bios_Code ends
