  7861                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7863                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7864                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7865                                  
  7866                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7867                                  
  7868                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7869                                  
  7870                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7871                                  
  7872                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7873                                  
  7874                                  ;************************************************************************
  7875                                  ;*									*
  7876                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7877                                  ;*									*
  7878                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7879                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7880                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7881                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7882                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7883                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7884                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7885                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7886                                  ;*									*
  7887                                  ;************************************************************************
  7888                                  
  7889                                  
  7890                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7891                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  7892                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7893 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  7894                                  
  7895                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7896 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7897                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7898 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7899                                  					; 00 init
  7900 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7901 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  7902 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7903                                  					; 03
  7904 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  7905                                  					; 04
  7906 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  7907                                  					; 05
  7908 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  7909 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  7910                                  					; 07
  7911 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  7912                                  					; 08
  7913 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  7914 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  7915                                  con_table_end:
  7916 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  7917                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  7918 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  7919 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7920 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7921 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  7922 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  7923                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  7924 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7925                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  7926 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7927 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7928 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  7929 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  7930 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  7931 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  7932 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  7933 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  7934 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  7935 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  7936 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  7937 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  7938 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  7939 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  7940 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  7941 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  7942 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  7943 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  7944 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  7945 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  7946                                  prn_table_end:
  7947 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  7948                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  7949 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  7950 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7951 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7952 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  7953 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  7954 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  7955 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7956 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  7957 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  7958 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  7959 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  7960                                  aux_table_end:
  7961 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  7962                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  7963 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  7964 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7965 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7966 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  7967 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  7968 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7969 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7970 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7971 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  7972 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  7973                                  tim_table_end:
  7974                                  
  7975                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7976                                  
  7977                                  ;************************************************************************
  7978                                  ;*									*
  7979                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  7980                                  ;*									*
  7981                                  ;************************************************************************
  7982                                  
  7983                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  7984                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  7985 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  7986                                  con_loop:				
  7987 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  7988 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  7989 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  7990                                  con_exit:				
  7991 00000164 F8                      		clc
  7992 00000165 C3                      		retn
  7993                                  
  7994                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7995                                  
  7996                                  ;************************************************************************
  7997                                  ;*									*
  7998                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  7999                                  ;*									*
  8000                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8001                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8002                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8003                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8004                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8005                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8006                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8007                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8008                                  ;*									*
  8009                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8010                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8011                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8012                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8013                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8014                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8015                                  ;*									*
  8016                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8017                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8018                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8019                                  ;*									*
  8020                                  ;************************************************************************
  8021                                  
  8022                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8023                                  chrin:		
  8024 00000166 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8025 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8026 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8027 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8028 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8029 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8030 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8031 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8032 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8033 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8034 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8035 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8036                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8037                                  
  8038                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8039                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8040                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8041                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8042                                  ;      else
  8043                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8044                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8045                                  ;      endif
  8046                                  ;    endif
  8047                                  ;  endif
  8048                                  
  8049                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8050 00000183 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8051 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8052 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8053 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8054 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8055 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8056 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8057 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8058                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8059                                  
  8060                                  not_ext:				
  8061 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8062 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8063                                  alt_save:				
  8064 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8065                                  keyret:					
  8066 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8067                                  
  8068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8069                                  
  8070                                  ;************************************************************************
  8071                                  ;*									*
  8072                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8073                                  ;*									*
  8074                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8075                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8076                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8077                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8078                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8079                                  ;*									*
  8080                                  ;************************************************************************
  8081                                  
  8082                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8083                                  con_rdnd:				
  8084 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8085 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8086 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8087 000001A6 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8088 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8089 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8090 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8091 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8092 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8093                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8094 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8095                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8096 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8097 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8098 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8099 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8100                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8101                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8102                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8103                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8104 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8105 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8106 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8107                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8108                                  
  8109                                  gotchr:					
  8110 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8111 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8112 000001CF 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8113 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8114 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8115                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8116                                  
  8117                                  notbrk:					
  8118 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8119 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8120 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8121 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8122                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8123                                  
  8124                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8125 000001E0 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8126 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8127 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8128 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8129 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8130 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8131 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8132                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8133                                  rdexit:					
  8134 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8135 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8136                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8137                                  bc_exvec:				
  8138 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8139                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8140 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8141                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8142                                  
  8143                                  ;************************************************************************
  8144                                  ;*									*
  8145                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8146                                  ;*									*
  8147                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8148                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8149                                  ;*									*
  8150                                  ;************************************************************************
  8151                                  
  8152                                  con_writ:
  8153                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8154 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8155                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8156                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8157                                  con_lp:					
  8158 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8159 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8160 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8161                                  					; AL = character to display
  8162 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8163                                  cc_ret:					
  8164 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8165 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8166                                  
  8167                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8168                                  
  8169                                  ;************************************************************************
  8170                                  ;*									*
  8171                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8172                                  ;*									*
  8173                                  ;************************************************************************
  8174                                  
  8175                                  con_flush:
  8176 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8177                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8178 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8179 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8180                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8181                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8182                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8183 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8184 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8185 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8186                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8187 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8188                                  
  8189                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8190                                  
  8191                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8192                                  
  8193                                  ;************************************************************************
  8194                                  ;*									*
  8195                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8196                                  ;*									*
  8197                                  ;************************************************************************
  8198                                  
  8199                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8200                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8201                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8202                                  
  8203                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8204                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8205                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8206                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8207                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8208                                  ;
  8209                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8210                                  
  8211                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8212                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8213                                  
  8214                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8215                                  
  8216                                  ;************************************************************************
  8217                                  ;*									*
  8218                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8219                                  ;*									*
  8220                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8221                                  ;*									*
  8222                                  ;************************************************************************
  8223                                  
  8224                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8225 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8226                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8227                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8228                                  prn_done:
  8229 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8230 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8231                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8232                                  
  8233                                  ;************************************************************************
  8234                                  ;*									*
  8235                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8236                                  ;*									*
  8237                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8238                                  ;*									*
  8239                                  ;************************************************************************
  8240                                  
  8241                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8242                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8243 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8244                                  prn_loop:				
  8245 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8246                                  prn_out:				
  8247 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8248 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8249 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8250 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8251 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8252 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8253 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8254 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8255 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8256 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8257 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8259                                  
  8260                                  _prnwf:					
  8261 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8262 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8263                                  TestPrnError:				
  8264 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8265 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8266                                  pmessg:					
  8267 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8269                                  
  8270                                  prn_con:				
  8271 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8272 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8273                                  ;prn_done:				
  8274                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8275                                  prn_done2:
  8276                                  		;clc
  8277                                  		; cf=0
  8278 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8280                                  
  8281                                  ;************************************************************************
  8282                                  ;*									*
  8283                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8284                                  ;*									*
  8285                                  ;************************************************************************
  8286                                  
  8287                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8288 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8289 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8290 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8291                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8292                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8293 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8294 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8295                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8296                                  
  8297                                  ;************************************************************************
  8298                                  ;*									*
  8299                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8300                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8301                                  ;*									*
  8302                                  ;************************************************************************
  8303                                  
  8304                                  prnstat:				
  8305 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8306                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8307                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8308                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8309                                  
  8310                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8311                                  
  8312                                  ;************************************************************************
  8313                                  ;*									*
  8314                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8315                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8316                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8317                                  ;*									*
  8318                                  ;************************************************************************
  8319                                  
  8320                                  prnop:	
  8321 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8322 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8323                                  
  8324                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8325                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8326                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8327                                  
  8328 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  8329 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8330 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8331 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  8332 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8333 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8334 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8335                                  
  8336                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8337                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8338                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8339                                  
  8340                                  NextTest:				
  8341 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8342                                  					; i/o error?
  8343 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8344                                  
  8345                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8346                                  
  8347 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8348                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8349 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8350 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8351 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8352                                  ret1:					
  8353 00000282 C3                      		retn
  8354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8355                                  
  8356                                  checknotready:				
  8357 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8358 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8359 00000288 C3                      		retn
  8360                                  
  8361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8362                                  
  8363                                  ;************************************************************************
  8364                                  ;*									*
  8365                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8366                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8367                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8368                                  ;*									*
  8369                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8370                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8371                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8372                                  ;*									*
  8373                                  ;************************************************************************
  8374                                  
  8375                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8376                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8377 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8378                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8379 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  8380 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  8381 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8382 0000028F 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8383 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8384                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8385 00000295 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8386 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  8387                                  prn_getstat:				
  8388 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8389 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8390 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8391 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8392 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8393 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8394 000002A7 26                      		es
  8395 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  8396                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8397                                  					; lodsb
  8398 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8399 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8400 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8401 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8402                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8403                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8404                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8405 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8406                                  
  8407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8408                                  
  8409                                  prn_bperr:				
  8410 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8411                                  prn_berr:				
  8412 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8413                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8414                                  
  8415                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8416                                  
  8417                                  ;************************************************************************
  8418                                  ;*									*
  8419                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8420                                  ;*									*
  8421                                  ;************************************************************************
  8422                                  
  8423                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8424                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8425                                  
  8426                                  ;********************************;*
  8427                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8428                                  ;********************************;*
  8429                                  
  8430                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8431                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8432                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8433                                  
  8434                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8435                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8436                                  ;;endstruc
  8437                                  
  8438                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8439                                  
  8440                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8441                                  
  8442                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8443                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8444 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8445 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8446                                  					; ioc_pc
  8447 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8448                                  
  8449                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8450 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8452                                  
  8453                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8454 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8455 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8456 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8457                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8458 000002CF 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8459 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8460                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8461 000002D5 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8462 000002D9 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8463 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8464 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8465 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8466 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8467                                  prngetcount:				
  8468                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8469 000002E4 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8470 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8471                                  					; return current retry count
  8472                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8473                                  		; cf=0
  8474                                  		;clc
  8475 000002EB C3                      		retn
  8476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8477                                  
  8478                                  ;************************************************************************
  8479                                  ;*									*
  8480                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8481                                  ;*									*
  8482                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8483                                  ;************************************************************************
  8484                                  
  8485                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8486 000002EC C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8487 000002F0 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8488                                  					; ioc_pc
  8489 000002F5 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8490 000002F7 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8491 000002FB 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8492 000002FD 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8493 000002FF 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8494 00000301 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8495                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8496                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8497                                  		; cf=0		
  8498                                  		;clc
  8499 00000303 C3                      		retn

  8502                                  prn_query_err:
  8503                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8504                                  		;stc
  8505 00000304 E9CEFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8506                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8507                                  
  8508                                  ;************************************************************************
  8509                                  ;*									*
  8510                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8511                                  ;*									*
  8512                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8513                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8514                                  ;*									*
  8515                                  ;************************************************************************
  8516                                  
  8517                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8518                                  
  8519                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8520                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8521                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8522                                  
  8523                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8524                                  
  8525                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8526                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8527                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8528                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8529                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8530                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8531                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8532                                  
  8533                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8534                                  
  8535                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8536                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8537                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8538                                  
  8539                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8540                                  
  8541                                  ;************************************************************************
  8542                                  ;*									*
  8543                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8544                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8545                                  ;*									*
  8546                                  ;************************************************************************
  8547                                  
  8548                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8549                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8550 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8551 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8552 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8553 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8554 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8555 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8556                                  aux1:					
  8557 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8558                                  					; won't return if error
  8559                                  aux2:					
  8560 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  8561 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8562                                  exvec2:					
  8563 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8564                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8565 0000031B C3                      		retn

  8567                                  
  8568                                  ;************************************************************************
  8569                                  ;*									*
  8570                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8571                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8572                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8573                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8574                                  ;*									*
  8575                                  ;************************************************************************
  8576                                  
  8577                                  auxin:

  8580 00000321 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8581                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8582                                  		;retn
  8583                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8584 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8585                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8586                                  
  8587                                  arbad:					
  8588 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8589                                  		;xor	al, al
  8590                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8591                                  		; 11/08/2023
  8592 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  8593 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8594                                  
  8595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8596                                  
  8597                                  ;************************************************************************
  8598                                  ;*									*
  8599                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8600                                  ;*									*
  8601                                  ;************************************************************************
  8602                                  
  8603                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8604 0000032C E85200                  		call	getbx
  8605 0000032F 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8606 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8607 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8608 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8609 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8610 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8611 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8612 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8613 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8614 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8615                                  auxdrx:					
  8616 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8617                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8618                                  
  8619                                  auxbus:					
  8620 00000349 E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit

  8622                                  
  8623                                  ;************************************************************************
  8624                                  ;*									*

  8626                                  ;*									*

  8628                                  
  8629                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
