 10306                                  dsk_open_exit:

 10318 0000089F 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 10319 000008A4 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 10320 000008A6 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 10321                                  exitjx:					
 10322                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10323                                  		; cf = 0
 10324                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10325                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10326 000008AA C3                      		retn

 10388                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 10390                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10391                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10392                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10393                                  
 10394                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10395                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10396                                  ;
 10397                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10398                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10399                                  
 10400                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10401                                  checksingle:		
 10402 000008D5 50                      		push	ax
 10403 000008D6 53                      		push	bx
 10404 000008D7 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10405                                  
 10406                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10407                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10408                                  
 10409 000008DB F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10410 000008DE 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10411 000008E0 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10412                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10413 000008E3 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10414                                  
 10415                                  
 10416                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10417                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10418                                  
 10419 000008E5 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10420                                  					; get physical drive number
 10421 000008E9 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10422 000008EA 57                      		push	di
 10423 000008EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10424                                  scan_list:				
 10425 000008EF 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10426 000008F3 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10427 000008F5 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10428 000008F7 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10429 000008FB 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10430 000008FD 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10431 00000901 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10432 00000902 07                      		pop	es
 10433 00000903 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10434                                  
 10435                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10436                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10437                                  ; in this case.
 10438 00000907 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10439 0000090C 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10440                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10441 0000090E 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10442 00000913 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10443 00000915 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10444                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10445                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10446 00000919 06                      		push	es
 10447 0000091A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10448 0000091E 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10449                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10450                                  					; set up sdsb
 10451 00000922 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10452 00000923 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10453                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10454                                  
 10455                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10456                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10457                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10458                                  
 10459                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10460 00000925 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10461 0000092A 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10462 0000092C 50                      		push	ax
 10463 0000092D 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10464 00000931 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10465 00000933 06                      		push	es
 10466 00000934 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10467 00000938 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10468                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10469                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10470 0000093D 07                      		pop	es
 10471 0000093E 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10472 00000940 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10473 00000941 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10474                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10475 00000943 E8690E                  		call	swpdsk
 10476 00000946 EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10478                                  
 10479                                  scan_skip:	
 10480 00000948 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10481                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10482                                  					; go to	next bds
 10483 0000094B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10484 0000094E 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10485 00000950 F9                      		stc
 10486 00000951 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 10487 00000952 07                      		pop	es

 10511                                  
 10512                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10513                                  
 10514                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10515                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10516                                  ;
 10517                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10518                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10519                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10520                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10521                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10522                                  ;	ds = cs
 10523                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10524                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10525                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10526                                  ;
 10527                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10528                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10529                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10530                                  
 10531                                  diskrd:	
 10532                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10533                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10534 0000095E C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10535                                  
 10536                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10537                                  
 10538                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10539                                  diskio:
 10540 00000963 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10541 00000965 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10542 00000969 E801FC                  		call	SetDrive
 10543 0000096C 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10544 00000970 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10545                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10546 00000973 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10547                                  
 10548                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10549                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10550                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10551                                  
 10552 00000975 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10553                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10554                                  					; unformatted_media
 10555 0000097A 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10556 0000097C 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10557 00000980 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10558                                  
 10559                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10560                                  
 10561 00000984 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10562 00000986 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10563 00000988 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10564                                  		;adc	si, 0
 10565                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10566 0000098A D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1
 10567 0000098C 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10568                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10569 00000991 740C                    		jz	short sanity32
 10570                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 10571                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10572 00000993 09F6                    		or	si, si
 10573 00000995 75BF                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10574 00000997 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10575 0000099B 77B9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10576 0000099D EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10578                                  
 10579                                  sanity32:				
 10580 0000099F 0336[2305]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10581 000009A3 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10582 000009A7 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10583 000009A9 77AB                    		ja	short baddrive
 10584 000009AB 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10585 000009AF 77A5                    		ja	short baddrive
 10586                                  
 10587                                  sanityok:				
 10588 000009B1 8B16[2305]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10589 000009B5 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10590 000009B9 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10591                                  
 10592                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10593                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10594                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10595                                  
 10596 000009BD A3[2505]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10597                                  
 10598                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10599                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10600                                  
 10601 000009C0 06                      		push	es
 10602                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10603                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10604 000009C1 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 10605 000009C3 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 10606 000009C5 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10607                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10608                                  					; current disk parm table
 10609 000009CA 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10610 000009CE 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10611 000009D2 07                      		pop	es
 10612 000009D3 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10613                                  					; fnon_removable
 10614 000009D8 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10615 000009DA E8F8FE                  		call	checksingle

 10992                                  
 10993                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10994                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft

 11039 00000C07 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11040 00000C09 C706[2C05]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11041                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11042                                  dskerr1:				
 11043 00000C0F 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11044                                  		;jmp	retry
 11045                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11046 00000C10 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11047                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11048                                  
 11049                                  write_fault_err:			
 11050 00000C13 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11051                                  					; for write fault error.
 11052 00000C16 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11053                                  
 11054                                  		; fall into harderr
 11055                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11056                                  
 11057                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11058                                  
 11059                                  harderr:				
 11060 00000C18 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11061                                  harderr2:				
 11062 00000C1B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11063                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11064 00000C20 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11065 00000C24 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11066                                  
 11067                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11068                                  
 11069                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11070                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11071 00000C28 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11072                                  
 11073                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11074                                  
 11075                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11076                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11077                                  
 11078                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11079                                  normspeed:
 11080 00000C2B 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11081 00000C30 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11082 00000C32 06                      		push	es
 11083 00000C33 50                      		push	ax
 11084 00000C34 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11085 00000C37 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11086 00000C3B 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11087 00000C3F 58                      		pop	ax
 11088 00000C40 07                      		pop	es
 11089 00000C41 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11090 00000C44 06                      		push	es
 11091 00000C45 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11092 00000C49 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11093                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11094 00000C4E 07                      		pop	es
 11095 00000C4F C3                      		retn
 11096                                  
 11097                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11098                                  
 11099                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11100                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11101                                  
 11102                                  fastspeed:		
 11103 00000C50 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11104                                  					; ftoobig
 11105 00000C55 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11106 00000C57 06                      		push	es
 11107 00000C58 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11108 00000C5C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11109 00000C5E 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11110 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 11111 00000C63 C3                      		retn
 11112                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11113                                  
 11114                                  notready:				
 11115 00000C64 F9                      		stc
 11116 00000C65 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11117 00000C67 C3                      		retn
 11118                                  
 11119                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11120                                  
 11121                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11122                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11123                                  
 11124                                  maperror:	
 11125 00000C68 51                      		push	cx
 11126 00000C69 06                      		push	es
 11127 00000C6A 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11128 00000C6B 07                      		pop	es
 11129 00000C6C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11130 00000C6E A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11131                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11132 00000C71 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11133                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11134 00000C74 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11135 00000C77 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11136                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11137                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11138                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11139 00000C79 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11140                                  					; get translation
 11141                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11142                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11143 00000C7C 07                      		pop	es
 11144 00000C7D 59                      		pop	cx
 11145 00000C7E F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11146 00000C7F C3                      		retn
 11147                                  
 11148                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11149                                  
 11150                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11151                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11152                                  
 11153                                  set_tim:		
 11154 00000C80 50                      		push	ax
 11155 00000C81 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11156                                  
 11157                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11158                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11159                                  
 11160 00000C84 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11161 00000C88 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11162 00000C8A 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11163                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11164                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11165 00000C8E 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11166                                  setaccess:				
 11167 00000C90 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11168 00000C95 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11169 00000C99 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11170                                  done_set:				
 11171 00000C9D F8                      		clc
 11172                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11173 00000C9E 58                      		pop	ax
 11174 00000C9F C3                      		retn
 11175                                  
 11176                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11177                                  
 11178                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11179                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11180                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11181                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11182                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11183                                  
 11184                                  again:	
 11185 00000CA0 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11186 00000CA3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11187 00000CA6 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11188                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11189 00000CA8 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11190 00000CA9 C3                      		retn
 11191                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11192                                  
 11193                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11194 00000CAA 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11195 00000CAC C3                      		retn

 11210                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11211                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11212                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11213                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed

 11215                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -

 11217                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11300                                  
 11301                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11302                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11303                                  ;
 11304                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11305                                  ;
 11306                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11307                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11308                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11309                                  ;
 11310                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11311                                  
 11312                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11313                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11314                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11315 00000CDD E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11316 00000CE0 06                      		push	es
 11317 00000CE1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11318 00000CE5 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11319                                  					; RAWIO
 11320 00000CEA 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11321 00000CEE 07                      		pop	es
 11322 00000CEF 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11323                                  
 11324                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11325                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11326                                  
 11327                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11328 00000CF1 BE[AE0C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11329                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11330                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11331 00000CF4 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11332 00000CF6 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11333                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11334 00000CF8 BE[C10C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11335                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11336                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11337                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11338 00000CFB 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11339 00000CFD 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11340 00000CFF 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11341 00000D02 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11342 00000D04 98                      		cbw
 11343 00000D05 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11344 00000D07 46                      		inc	si
 11345 00000D08 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11346 00000D0A 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11347                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11348 00000D0D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11349                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11350                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11351 00000D12 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11352 00000D14 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11354                                  
 11355                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11356                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11357                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11358 00000D15 5A                      		pop	dx
 11359                                  
 11360                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11361 00000D16 E9BCF3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11363                                  
 11364                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11365                                  
 11366                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11367                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11368                                  ;
 11369                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11370                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11371                                  ;
 11372                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11373                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11374                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11375                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11376                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11377                                  
 11378                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11379                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11380                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11381                                  
 11382 00000D19 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11383 00000D1D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11384                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11385 00000D20 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11386 00000D24 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11387 00000D27 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11388 00000D2B 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11389                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11390 00000D2E 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11391 00000D31 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11392 00000D35 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11393 00000D38 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11394 00000D3A 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11395                                  					
 11396                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11397 00000D3D 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11398 00000D40 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11399                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11400 00000D43 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11401 00000D45 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11402 00000D46 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11403                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11404                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11405                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11406 00000D4B E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11407 00000D4E E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11408 00000D51 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11409 00000D52 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11410 00000D54 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11411                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11412                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11413 00000D57 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11414                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11415 00000D5A B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11416                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11417 00000D5D 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11418 00000D5E 06                      		push	es
 11419 00000D5F 1F                      		pop	ds
 11420 00000D60 07                      		pop	es
 11421 00000D61 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11422                                  		
 11423                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11424                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11425                                  		;clc
 11426                                  GetParmRet:				
 11427 00000D63 C3                      		retn
 11428                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11429                                  
 11430                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11431                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11432                                  
 11433                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11434                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11435                                  ;
 11436                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11437                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11438                                  
 11439                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11440                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 11441 00000D64 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11442 00000D68 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

 11444                                  					; fchanged_by_format|fchanged

 11446                                  					; ONLY_SET_TRACKLAYOUT
 11447 00000D74 7579                    		jnz	short setTrackTable
 11448 00000D76 8A4701                  		mov	al, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11449 00000D79 26884522                		mov	[es:di+34], al	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11450 00000D7D 8B4704                  		mov	ax, [bx+4]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11451 00000D80 26894525                		mov	[es:di+37], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11452 00000D84 8B4702                  		mov	ax, [bx+2]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11453 00000D87 1E                      		push	ds
 11454                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11455 00000D88 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11456                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11457                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11458                                  		;cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11459 00000D8D 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11460 00000D92 1F                      		pop	ds
 11461 00000D93 7502                    		jnz	short HaveChange ; we have changeline support

 11599                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11600                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11601                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11602                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11603                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11604                                  ;
 11605                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11606                                  ;
 11607                                  ; output:
 11608                                  ;	for status call:
 11609                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11610                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11611                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11612                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11613                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11614                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11615                                  ;
 11616                                  ;	for format track:
 11617                                  ;		carry set if error
 11618                                  ;
 11619                                  ; ==========================================================================

 11880                                  
 11881 00000F8A 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 11882 00000F8E 07                      		pop	es
 11883                                  
 11884                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 11885                                  
 11886                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11887                                  
 11888                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11889                                  
 11890                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11891                                  ;
 11892                                  ; TrackIo:
 11893                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11894                                  ;
 11895                                  ;   input:
 11896                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11897                                  ;		  3 = write
 11898                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11899                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11900                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11901                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11902                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11903                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11904                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11905                                  ;
 11906                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11907                                  
 11908                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11909                                  		
 11910                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11911                                  TrackIo:	
 11912                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11913 00000F8F 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11914 00000F93 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11915 00000F96 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11916                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11917 00000F9B 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11918 00000F9D 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11919 00000F9E 51                      		push	cx
 11920 00000F9F E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 11921 00000FA2 59                      		pop	cx
 11922 00000FA3 58                      		pop	ax
 11923                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11924 00000FA4 BE[3305]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11925 00000FA7 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11926 00000FA9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11927 00000FAB 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11928                                  
 11929                                  		; WE WANT:
 11930                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11931                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11932                                  		
 11933 00000FAD BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11934                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11935 00000FB0 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11936                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11937                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11938 00000FB5 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11939                                  		
 11940 00000FB7 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11941                                  ionextsector:				
 11942 00000FB9 51                      		push	cx
 11943 00000FBA 52                      		push	dx
 11944 00000FBB 46                      		inc	si
 11945 00000FBC 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11946                                  					; the track table
 11947 00000FBD AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11948 00000FBE A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11949                                  
 11950                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11951                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11952                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11953                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11954                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11955                                  		
 11956                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11957 00000FC1 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11958                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11959                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11960 00000FC6 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11961                                  		; 12/12/2022

 11963                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11964                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11965 00000FCD 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11966 00000FCF 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11967 00000FD3 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11968 00000FD5 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 11969 00000FD8 5A                      		pop	dx
 11970 00000FD9 59                      		pop	cx
 11971 00000FDA F8                      		clc
 11972 00000FDB C3                      		retn
 11973                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11974                                  
 11975                                  IoRemovable:				
 11976 00000FDC AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11977                                  					; table	and save it
 11978 00000FDD 50                      		push	ax
 11979 00000FDE 56                      		push	si
 11980 00000FDF 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11981 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 11982 00000FE1 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11983                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data

 11986 00000FEC 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]

 11988 00000FF0 1F                      		pop	ds

 11990 00000FF3 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11991 00000FF6 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk

 11993                                  					; sector size
 11994 00000FFA 58                      		pop	ax
 11995                                  
 11996                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11997                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize

 11999 00000FFD B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12000 00001000 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12001

 12003 00001004 5A                      		pop	dx
 12004 00001005 59                      		pop	cx

 12006 00001008 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12008                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12011                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12012                                  NoNeedDone:

 12022                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12023                                  ; are permissible.

 12071 00001014 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;

 12136                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12137                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12138 00001069 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12139 0000106D 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 12142                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12143                                  
 12144                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12145                                  
 12146                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12147                                  ;
 12148                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12149                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12150                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12151                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12152                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12153                                  ;
 12154                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12155                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12156                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12157                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12158                                  ;
 12159                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12160                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12161                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12162                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12163                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12164                                  ;
 12165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12166                                  
 12167                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12168                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12169 00001072 51                      		push	cx
 12170 00001073 52                      		push	dx
 12171                                  
 12172                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12173                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12174                                  
 12175 00001074 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12176 00001079 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12177 0000107B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12178 0000107D 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12179 00001082 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12180 00001084 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12181                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12182                                  
 12183                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12184 00001086 06                      		push	es
 12185 00001087 56                      		push	si
 12186                                  		
 12187                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12188                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12189 00001088 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12190 0000108A 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12191                                  
 12192 0000108C 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12193                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12194                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12195 00001091 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12196 00001095 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12197                                  
 12198                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12199                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12200                                  
 12201 00001099 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12202 0000109E 5E                      		pop	si
 12203 0000109F 07                      		pop	es
 12204                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12205 000010A0 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12206 000010A4 49                      		dec	cx
 12207 000010A5 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12208 000010A8 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12209 000010AA D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12210 000010AC 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12211 000010AE 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12212 000010B2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12213 000010B6 06                      		push	es
 12214 000010B7 1E                      		push	ds

 12216 000010B9 57                      		push	di
 12217 000010BA B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12218 000010BC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12219                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12220 000010BE 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12221 000010C0 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12222 000010C5 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12223 000010C7 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12224                                  
 12225                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12226                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12227 000010C8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12228 000010CA 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12229 000010CC 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12230                                  
 12231 000010CD 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12232                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12233                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12234 000010D2 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12235 000010D6 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12236                                  
 12237                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12238                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12239                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12240                                  		;mov	es, si
 12241 000010DA 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12242

 12301                                  
 12302                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12303                                  
 12304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12305                                  ;
 12306                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12307                                  ;
 12308                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12309                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12310                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12311                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12312                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12313                                  ;
 12314                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12315                                  
 12316                                  ResetDisk:
 12317 00001106 50                      		push	ax
 12318                                  
 12319                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12320 00001107 B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12321 0000110A 3806[3006]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12322                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12323                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12324 0000110E 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12325                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12326                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12327 00001110 A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12328                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12329                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12330                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12331 00001113 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12332                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12333 00001115 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12334                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12335 0000111A 58                      		pop	ax
 12336 0000111B C3                      		retn
 12337                                  
 12338                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12339                                  
 12340                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12341                                  
 12342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12343                                  ;
 12344                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12345                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12346                                  ;
 12347                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12348                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12349                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12350                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12351                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12352                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12353                                  ;
 12354                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12355                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12356                                  ;
 12357                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12358                                  
 12359                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12360                                  ToRom:	
 12361 0000111C 53                      		push	bx
 12362 0000111D 56                      		push	si
 12363                                  
 12364                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12365                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12366                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]

 12416                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12417                                  ;
 12418                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12419                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12420                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12421                                  ;
 12422                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12424                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12425                                  ioctl_getown:
 12426 00001174 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12427 00001177 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12428                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12429 0000117B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12430                                  ownloop:				
 12431 0000117F 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12432 00001183 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12433                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12434 00001185 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12435                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12436                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12437 0000118A 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12438                                  getnextBDS:				
 12439 0000118C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12440 0000118F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12442                                  
 12443                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12444                                  ;
 12445                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12446                                  ; in al to al.
 12447                                  ;
 12448                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12449                                  
 12450                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12455 00001199 E839F7                  		call	checksingle

 12457 0000119C FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12458                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12459                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12460                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12461

 12465                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12466                                  ;
 12467                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12541                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12542                                  ;	get media id
 12543                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12544                                  ;
 12545                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12546                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12547                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12548                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12549                                  ;
 12550                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12551                                  ;
 12552                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12553                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12554                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12555                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12556                                  ;
 12557                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12558                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12559                                  ;
 12560                                  ; LOGIC:
 12561                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12562                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12563                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12564                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12565                                  ;
 12566                                  ; {
 12567                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12568                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12569                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12570                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12571                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12572                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12573                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12574                                  ;		};
 12575                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12576                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12577                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12578                                  ;		};
 12579                                  ;	else
 12580                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12581                                  ;
 12582                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12583                                  
 12584                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12585                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12586                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12587                                  
 12588                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12589                                  GetMediaId:
 12590 000011E5 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12591 000011E8 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12592 000011EC C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12593 000011F1 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12594 000011F4 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12595                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12596 000011F6 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12597                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12598 000011FB 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12599                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12600 000011FD BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12601 00001200 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12602                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12603                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12604 00001203 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12605 00001205 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12606 00001209 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12607                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12608 0000120D 46                      		inc	si
 12609                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12610                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12611 0000120E 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12612 00001211 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12613                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12614                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12615 00001214 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12616                                  	
 12617                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12618                                  		; cf = 0
 12619                                  		;clc
 12620                                  
 12621 00001216 C3                      		retn
 12622                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12623                                  
 12624                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12625 00001217 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12626 00001219 F9                      		stc
 12627                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12628 0000121A C3                      		retn
 12629                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12630                                  
 12631                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12632                                  
 12633                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12634                                  ;  set media id
 12635                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12636                                  
 12637                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12638                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12639                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12640                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12641                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12642                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12643                                  ;
 12644                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12645                                  ;
 12646                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12647                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12648                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12649                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12650                                  ;
 12651                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12652                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12653                                  ;
 12654                                  ; logic:
 12655                                  ;
 12656                                  ; {
 12657                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12658                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12659                                  ;	BootIo;
 12660                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12661                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12662                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12663                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12664                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12665                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12666                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12667                                  ;		};
 12668                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12669                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12670                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12671                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12672                                  ;		};
 12673                                  ;	else
 12674                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12675                                  ;
 12676                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12677                                  
 12678                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12679                                  SetMediaId:
 12680 0000121B E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12681 0000121E 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12682                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12683 00001222 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12684 00001224 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12685 00001229 52                      		push	dx
 12686 0000122A E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12687 0000122D 5A                      		pop	dx
 12688 0000122E 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12689                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12690 00001230 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12691                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12692 00001235 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12693 00001237 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12694                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12695 0000123C 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12696 0000123E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12697 0000123F 57                      		push	di
 12698 00001240 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12699 00001241 07                      		pop	es
 12700 00001242 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12701 00001245 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12702 00001249 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12703 0000124C 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12704 0000124F B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12705                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12706                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12707 00001252 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12708 00001254 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12709 00001255 1F                      		pop	ds
 12710 00001256 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12711 00001257 07                      		pop	es
 12712 00001258 E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12713 0000125B 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12714 0000125D C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12715 00001262 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12716 00001265 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12717                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12718                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12719 0000126A C3                      		retn
 12720                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12721                                  
 12722                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12723 0000126B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12724 0000126D F9                      		stc
 12725                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12726 0000126E C3                      		retn
