 14401                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14402                                  
 14403                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14404                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14405                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14406                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14407                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14408                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14409                                  
 14410                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14411 000017F1 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14412 000017F3 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14412 000017FC 736B6574746520666F-
 14412 00001805 7220647269766520   
 14413                                  
 14414                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14415 0000180D 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14415 00001816 65737320616E79206B-
 14415 0000181F 6579207768656E2072-
 14415 00001828 656164790D0A       
 14416 0000182E 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14417                                  
 14418                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14419                                  
 14420                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14421                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14422                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14423                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14424                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14425                                  
 14426                                  chkopcnt:		
 14427 00001830 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14428 00001835 C3                      		retn
 14429                                  
 14430                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14431                                  
 14432                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14433                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14434                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14435                                  ;
 14436                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14437                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14438                                  
 14439                                  mediacheck:	
 14440 00001836 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14441 00001839 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14442 0000183B E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14443 0000183E 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14444 00001840 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14445 00001843 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14446 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 14447 00001846 52                      		push	dx
 14448 00001847 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14449                                  					; set logical drive number
 14450 0000184B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14451 0000184D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14452                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14453                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14454 0000184F 5A                      		pop	dx
 14455 00001850 58                      		pop	ax
 14456 00001851 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14457 00001853 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14458                                  
 14459                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14460                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14461                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14462                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14463                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14464                                  ; status.
 14465                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14466 00001856 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14467 0000185A 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14468                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14469                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14470                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14471                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14472 0000185E 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14473                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14474                                  
 14475                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14476                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14477                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14478                                  
 14479 00001860 50                      		push	ax
 14480 00001861 51                      		push	cx
 14481 00001862 52                      		push	dx
 14482 00001863 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14483 00001866 5A                      		pop	dx
 14484 00001867 59                      		pop	cx
 14485 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14486 00001869 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14487 0000186B 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14488                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14489 0000186D 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14490                                  mediaret:				
 14491 0000186F C3                      		retn
 14492                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14493                                  
 14494                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14495                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14496                                  ; or write.
 14497                                  
 14498                                  mediadovolid:				
 14499 00001870 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14500 00001873 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14501 00001875 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14502 00001878 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14503 0000187A E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14505                                  
 14506                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14507                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14508                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14509                                  ; dos.
 14510                                  ;
 14511                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14512                                  
 14513                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14514                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14515                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14516                                  
 14517                                  checklatchio:	
 14518                                  
 14519                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14520                                  			
 14521 0000187D E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14522 00001880 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14523                                  
 14524                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14525                                  
 14526 00001882 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14527 00001885 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14528                                  
 14529                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14530                                  ; expensive verification.
 14531                                  
 14532 00001887 E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14533 0000188A 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14534 0000188C E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14535 0000188F 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14536 00001891 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14537 00001893 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14538 00001895 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14539                                  checklatchret:				
 14540 00001898 E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14541                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14542 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14543 0000189C 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14544                                  checkret:				
 14545 0000189D C3                      		retn
 14546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14547                                  
 14548                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14549                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14550                                  ;
 14551                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14552                                  
 14553                                  checkfatvid:				
 14554 0000189E E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14555 000018A1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14556 000018A3 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14557                                  
 14558                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14559                                  
 14560                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14561                                  
 14562                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14563                                  
 14564                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14565                                  ;
 14566                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14567                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14568                                  ;
 14569                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14570                                  ;
 14571                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14572                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14573                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14574                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14575                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14576                                  ;
 14577                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14578                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14579                                  ; routine.)
 14580                                  ;
 14581                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14582                                  
 14583                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14584                                  check_vid:
 14585                                  
 14586                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14587                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14588                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14589                                  
 14590 000018A5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14591                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14592                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14593 000018AA 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14594 000018AC E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14595 000018AF 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14596 000018B1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14597 000018B3 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14598                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14599 000018B8 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14600                                  					; if not fat system
 14601 000018BA E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14602 000018BD 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14603 000018BF E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14604 000018C2 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14605                                  					; definitely changed
 14606 000018C5 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14607                                  
 14608 000018C7 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14609                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14610 000018C8 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14611                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14612                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14613                                  		;clc
 14614                                  checkfatret:				
 14615 000018CB C3                      		retn
 14616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14617                                  
 14618                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14619                                  changed_drv:
 14620 000018CC F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14621 000018CD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14622                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14623 000018D2 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14624                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14625                                  
 14626                                  ; extended id check
 14627                                  
 14628                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14629                                  
 14630                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14631                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14632                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14633                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14634                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14635                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14636                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14637                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14638                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14639                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14640                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14641                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14642                                  ;
 14643                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14644                                  
 14645                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14646                                  do_ext_check_id:
 14647 000018D3 50                      		push	ax
 14648                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14649                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14650 000018D4 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14651                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14652 000018D7 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14653 000018D9 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14654 000018DD 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14655 000018DF A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14656 000018E2 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14657 000018E6 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14658                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14659                                  					; don't know
 14660 000018E8 58                      		pop	ax
 14661 000018E9 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14662                                  					; reset the flag
 14663                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14664                                  
 14665                                  ext_changed:
 14666 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 14667                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14668 000018EC 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14669                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14670                                  					; disk changed!
 14671                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14672                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14673                                  		;clc
 14674 000018ED EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14675                                  
 14676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14677                                  
 14678                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14679                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14680                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14681                                  ;
 14682                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14683                                  
 14684                                  checkio:				
 14685 000018EF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14686 000018F2 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14687 000018F4 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14688 000018F7 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14689 000018F9 E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 14690 000018FC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14691 000018FE E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14692 00001901 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14693 00001903 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14694 00001905 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14695 00001907 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14696 00001908 C3                      		retn
 14697                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14698                                  
 14699                                  checkioerr:				
 14700 00001909 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14701                                  
 14702                                  checkioret:				
 14703 0000190C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14704 0000190D E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14705                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14706                                  
 14707                                  no_error_map:				
 14708 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14709                                  
 14710                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14711                                  
 14712                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14713                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14714                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14715                                  
 14716                                  returnvid:		
 14717 00001913 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14718                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14719 00001916 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14720 00001919 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14721 0000191B F9                      		stc
 14722 0000191C C3                      		retn
 14723                                  
 14724                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14725                                  
 14726                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14727                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14728                                  ;
 14729                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14730                                  ; **trashes si**
 14731                                  
 14732                                  media_set_vid:				
 14733 0000191D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14734                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14735                                  
 14736                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14737                                  
 14738                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14739                                  
 14740                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14741                                  
 14742                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14743                                  vid_into_packet:
 14744 00001920 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14745 00001921 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14746 00001925 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14747 00001928 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14748 0000192A 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14749 0000192D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14750 00001930 1F                      		pop	ds
 14751                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14752 00001931 C3                      		retn
 14753                                  
 14754                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14755                                  
 14756                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14757                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14758                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14759                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14760                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14761                                  ;
 14762                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14763                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14764                                  ;
 14765                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14766                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14767                                  ;		carry set
 14768                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14769                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14770                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14771                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14772                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14773                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14774                                  ;
 14775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14776                                  
 14777                                  hidensity:
 14778                                  
 14779                                  ; check for correct drive
 14780                                  		
 14781                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14782 00001932 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14783                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14784                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14785 00001937 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14786                                  
 14787                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14788                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14789                                  
 14790 00001939 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14791 0000193E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14792                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14793                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14794 00001940 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14795 00001943 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14796                                  
 14797                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14798                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14799                                  
 14800                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14801 00001945 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14802 00001949 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 14803                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14804                                  					; ffOther
 14805 0000194B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 14806 0000194D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 14807                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14808                                  					; ff288
 14809 0000194F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 14810 00001951 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14811 00001953 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14812                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14813                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14814 00001956 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14815                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14816                                  					; 2 sides
 14817                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14818 00001959 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 14819 0000195A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14820                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14821                                  					; & head max
 14822                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14823 0000195D E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14824                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14825                                  
 14826                                  Is720K:
 14827                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14828 00001960 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 14829                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14830 00001961 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14832                                  
 14833                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14834                                  ;dofloppy:
 14835                                  		;retn
 14836                                  
 14837                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14838                                  
 14839                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14840                                  
 14841                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14842                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14843                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14844                                  ;
 14845                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14846                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14847                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14848                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14849                                  ;
 14850                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14851                                  ;
 14852                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14853                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14854                                  
 14855                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14856 00001964 06                      		push	es
 14857 00001965 57                      		push	di
 14858                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14859                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14860 00001966 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14861                                  
 14862                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14863                                  
 14864                                  scan_bds:				
 14865 0000196A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14866 0000196E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14867                                  
 14868                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14869                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14870                                  
 14871 00001970 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14872                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14873                                  get_next_bds:				
 14874 00001974 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14875                                  					; go to	next bds
 14876 00001977 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14877 0000197A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14878 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 14879 0000197D 07                      		pop	es
 14880 0000197E C3                      		retn
 14881                                  
 14882                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14883                                  
 14884                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14885                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14886                                  ;
 14887                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14888                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14889                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14890                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14891                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14892                                  
 14893                                  checkromchange:	
 14894                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14895                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14896 0000197F 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14897                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14898                                  					; fchanged
 14899 00001984 C3                      		retn
 14900                                  
 14901                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14902                                  
 14903                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14904                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14905                                  ;
 14906                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14907                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14908                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14909                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14910                                  
 14911                                  resetchanged:	
 14912                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14913                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14914 00001985 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14915                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14916                                  					; ~fchanged
 14917 0000198A C3                      		retn
 14918                                  
 14919                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14920                                  
 14921                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14922                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14923                                  ;
 14924                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14925                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14926                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14927                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14928                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14929                                  
 14930                                  haschange:
 14931                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14932                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14933 0000198B 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14934                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14935                                  					; fchangeline
 14936 00001990 C3                      		retn
 14937                                  
 14938                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14939                                  
 14940                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14941                                  
 14942                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14943                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14944                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14945                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14946                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14947                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14948                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14949                                  
 14950                                  ; set_volume_id
 14951                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14952                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14953                                  ;
 14954                                  ;   on entry:
 14955                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14956                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14957                                  ;
 14958                                  ;   on exit:
 14959                                  ;	carry clear:
 14960                                  ;	   successful call
 14961                                  ;	carry set
 14962                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14963                                  
 14964                                  set_volume_id:				
 14965 00001991 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14966 00001992 50                      		push	ax
 14967 00001993 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14968 00001996 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14969 00001998 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14970 0000199B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14971 0000199D E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14972 000019A0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14973                                  setvret:				
 14974                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14975                                  		; cf = 0
 14976                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14977 000019A3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14978 000019A4 5A                      		pop	dx
 14979 000019A5 C3                      		retn
 14980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14981                                  
 14982                                  seterr:					
 14983 000019A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14984 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14985 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 14986                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14987 000019A9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14988                                  
 14989                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14990                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14991                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14992                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14993                                  
 14994                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14995                                  
 14996                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14997                                  
 14998                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14999                                  ;
 15000                                  ;   on entry:
 15001                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15002                                  ;
 15003                                  ;   on exit:
 15004                                  ;	carry clear
 15005                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15006                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15007                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15008                                  ;
 15009                                  ;	carry set:
 15010                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15011                                  
 15012                                  read_volume_id:
 15013 000019AB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15014 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 15015 000019AD 53                      		push	bx
 15016 000019AE 50                      		push	ax
 15017 000019AF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15018 000019B0 57                      		push	di
 15019 000019B1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15020 000019B2 07                      		pop	es
 15021 000019B3 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15022 000019B6 BE[9E08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15023                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15024 000019B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15025 000019BC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15026 000019BE 5F                      		pop	di
 15027 000019BF 07                      		pop	es
 15028 000019C0 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15029                                  					; # of fats
 15030 000019C4 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15031                                  					; sectors / fat
 15032 000019C8 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15033 000019CA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15034                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15035                                  					;
 15036                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15037                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15038 000019CE 2EA3[A919]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15039                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15040                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15041 000019D2 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15042                                  					; # root dir entries
 15043 000019D6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15044 000019D8 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15045                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15046                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15047 000019DA 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15048                                  next_sec:
 15049 000019DB 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15050 000019DC 2EA1[A919]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15051                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15052                                  					; get sector #
 15053 000019E0 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15054                                  					; sectors / track
 15055 000019E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15056 000019E6 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15057                                  
 15058                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15059                                  
 15060 000019E8 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15061                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15062 000019E9 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15063 000019EB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15064 000019ED 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15065                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15066 000019F1 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15067 000019F3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15068 000019F5 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15069                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15070 000019F8 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15071 000019FA B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15072 000019FD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15073                                  fvid_loop:
 15074                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15075 000019FF 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15076                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15077 00001A01 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15078 00001A03 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15079 00001A06 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15080 00001A08 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15081 00001A0B 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15082                                  ent_loop:
 15083 00001A0D 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15084 00001A10 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15085 00001A12 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15086 00001A13 2EFF06[A919]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15087                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15088                                  					; next sector
 15089 00001A18 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15090                                  notfound:
 15091                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15092                                  		;xor	si, si
 15093 00001A1A EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15094                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15095                                  
 15096                                  found_vid:
 15097                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15098                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15099 00001A1C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15100 00001A1D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15101 00001A1F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15102 00001A20 57                      		push	di
 15103 00001A21 1E                      		push	ds
 15104 00001A22 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15105 00001A23 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15106 00001A26 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15107                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15108 00001A29 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15109                                  		;xor	al, al
 15110                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15111 00001A2B 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15112 00001A2C AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15113                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15114                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15115                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15116 00001A2D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15117 00001A2E 07                      		pop	es
 15118                                  fvid_ret:
 15119                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15120 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15121                                  				
 15122 00001A31 58                      		pop	ax
 15123                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15124                                  		; cf = 0
 15125                                  		;clc
 15126                                  rvidret:
 15127 00001A32 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15128 00001A33 59                      		pop	cx
 15129 00001A34 5A                      		pop	dx
 15130 00001A35 C3                      		retn
 15131                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15132                                  
 15133                                  no_vid:
 15134 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15135                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15136                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15137 00001A37 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15138                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15139                                  
 15140                                  readviderr:
 15141 00001A39 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15142 00001A3A 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15143 00001A3B EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15144                                  
 15145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15146                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15147                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15148                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15149 00001A3D BE[AA08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15150                                  		;
 15151                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15152                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15153                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15154                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15155 00001A40 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15156 00001A43 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15157                                  		;
 15158 00001A46 FC                      		cld
 15159 00001A47 C3                      		retn
 15160                                  
 15161                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15162                                  
 15163                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15164                                  ;
 15165                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15166                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15167                                  
 15168                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15169 00001A48 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15170 00001A49 56                      		push	si
 15171 00001A4A 51                      		push	cx
 15172                                  		
 15173                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15174                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15175                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15176                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15177                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15178                                  		;cld
 15179                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15180 00001A4B E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15181                                  
 15182 00001A4E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15183 00001A50 59                      		pop	cx
 15184 00001A51 5E                      		pop	si
 15185 00001A52 5F                      		pop	di
 15186 00001A53 C3                      		retn
 15187                                  
 15188                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15189                                  
 15190                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15191                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15192                                  ;
 15193                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15194                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15195                                  
 15196                                  check_volume_id:
 15197 00001A54 57                      		push	di
 15198 00001A55 51                      		push	cx
 15199                                  		
 15200                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15201                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15202                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15203                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15204                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15205                                  		;cld
 15206                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15207 00001A56 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15208                                  
 15209 00001A59 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15210 00001A5B 59                      		pop	cx
 15211 00001A5C 5F                      		pop	di
 15212 00001A5D C3                      		retn
 15213                                  
 15214                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15215                                  
 15216                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15217                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15218                                  ;
 15219                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15220                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15221                                  ;
 15222                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15223                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15224                                  ;
 15225                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15226                                  
 15227                                  fat_check:		
 15228 00001A5E 50                      		push	ax
 15229 00001A5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15230 00001A61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15231 00001A64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15232                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15233 00001A68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15234 00001A6A 4E                      		dec	si
 15235                                  okret1:					
 15236 00001A6B 58                      		pop	ax
 15237 00001A6C C3                      		retn
 15238                                  
 15239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15240                                  
 15241                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15242                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15243                                  
 15244                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15245                                  
 15246                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15247                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15248                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15249                                  
 15250                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15251                                  
 15252                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15253                                  		;db 0
 15254                                  
 15255                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15256                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15257                                  
 15258                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15259 00001A6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15260                                  %endif
 15261                                  
 15262                                  ;align 16
 15263                                  
 15264                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15265                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15266                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15267                                  BCODEEND:
 15268                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15269                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15270                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15271                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15272                                  ;SYSINITOFFSET	equ $-$$
 15273                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15274                                  
 15275                                  ; 28/09/2023
 15276                                  S2SIZE equ $-$$
