 32816                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32817                                  ;
 32818                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 32819                                  ;
 32820                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 32821                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32822                                  ;
 32823                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32824                                  
 32825                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32826                                  ;
 32827                                  ;PrepareMark:
 32828                                  ;	push	ds
 32829                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 32830                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32831                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32832                                  ;	pop	ds
 32833                                  ;
 32834                                  ;	inc	ax
 32835                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32836                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32837                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32838                                  ;	retn
 32839                                  
 32840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32841                                  ;
 32842                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32843                                  ;
 32844                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32845                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32846                                  ;		 the device.
 32847                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32848                                  ;
 32849                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32850                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32851                                  ;	UMB.
 32852                                  ;
 32853                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32854                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32855                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32856                                  ;
 32857                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32858                                  
 32859                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32860                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 32861                                  
 32862                                  GetUMBForDev:
 32863                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32864                                  	; ds = cs
 32865 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 32866 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32867 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 32868                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32869                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32870                                  
 32871 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32872                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 32873                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32874 0000305F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 32875                                  
 32876 00003061 4B                      	dec	bx
 32877                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32878                                  	; ds = cs
 32879 00003062 391E[5D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 32880                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32881 00003066 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32882                                  
 32883 00003068 43                      	inc	bx
 32884                                  
 32885 00003069 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32886 0000306C CD21                    	int	21h
 32887 0000306E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32888                                  
 32889                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32890                                  	;dec	ax
 32891                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32892                                  	;
 32893                                  PrepareMark:
 32894 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 32895 00003071 48                      	dec	ax
 32896 00003072 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32897 00003074 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32898 0000307A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32899 00003080 40                      	inc	ax
 32900 00003081 1F                      	pop	ds
 32901                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32902                                  	; ds = cs
 32903                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32904                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32905                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32906                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 32907 00003082 891E[6F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 32908 00003086 A3[6D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32909 00003089 A3[711F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32910                                  	;
 32911                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32912                                  	; cf=0
 32913                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 32914 0000308C C3                      	retn
 32915                                  
 32916                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32917                                  %if 1
 32918                                  gufd_err:
 32919 0000308D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 32920                                  gufd_error:
 32921 0000308F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32922 00003091 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 32923 00003092 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 32924                                  %endif
 32925                                  
 32926                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32927                                  %if 0
 32928                                  gufd_err:
 32929                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32930                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32931                                  	; ds = cs
 32932                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 32933                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32934                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32935                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 32936                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32937                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32938                                  	stc
 32939                                  	retn
 32940                                  %endif

 32943                                  ;
 32944                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32945                                  ;
 32946                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32947                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32948                                  ;
 32949                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32950                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32951                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32952                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32953                                  ;
 32954                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32955                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32956                                  ;
 32957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32958                                  
 32959                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32960                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32961                                  
 32962                                  DevSetMark:
 32963 00003094 06                      	push	es
 32964                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32965                                  	;push	di
 32966 00003095 1E                      	push	ds
 32967 00003096 56                      	push	si
 32968 00003097 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32969 00003099 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32970 0000309F 40                      	inc	ax
 32971 000030A0 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32972                                  
 32973                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32974                                  
 32975 000030A4 50                      	push	ax			; save load address
 32976                                  	
 32977                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32978                                  	; ds = cs
 32979                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32980 000030A5 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32981                                  
 32982 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32983 000030AB FC                      	cld
 32984                                  dsm_again:
 32985 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 32986 000030AD 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32987 000030AF 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32988 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32989 000030B3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32990                                  isit_slash:
 32991 000030B5 3C5C                    	cmp	al,'\'
 32992 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32993 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32994 000030BB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32995                                  isit_null:
 32996 000030BD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32997 000030BF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32998 000030C1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32999                                  
 33000 000030C3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33001 000030C6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33002                                  dsm_next_char:
 33003 000030C9 AC                      	lodsb
 33004 000030CA 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33005 000030CC 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33006 000030CE 3C2E                    	cmp	al,'.'
 33007 000030D0 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33008 000030D2 AA                      	stosb
 33009 000030D3 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33010                                  blankout:
 33011 000030D5 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33012 000030D7 B020                    	mov	al,' '
 33013 000030D9 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33014                                  dsm_exit:
 33015 000030DB 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load address
 33016 000030DC 5E                      	pop	si
 33017 000030DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 33018                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33019                                  	;pop	di
 33020 000030DE 07                      	pop	es
 33021 000030DF C3                      	retn

 33024                                  ;
 33025                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33026                                  ;
 33027                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33028                                  ;
 33029                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33030                                  ;
 33031                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33032                                  ;	in DevSize
 33033                                  ;
 33034                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33035                                  
 33036                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33037                                  SizeDevice:
 33038                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33039                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 33040 000030E0 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 33041 000030E1 06                      	push	es
 33042 000030E2 1F                      	pop	ds

 33044 000030E5 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 33045 000030E8 CD21                    	int	21h
 33046 000030EA 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 33047                                  
 33048 000030EC 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 33049 000030EE B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 33050 000030F1 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 33051 000030F3 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 33052 000030F5 CD21                    	int	21h
 33053 000030F7 7223                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 33054 000030F9 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 33055 000030FC 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33056 000030FF F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffffh paras ?
 33057                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no
 33058                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33059 00003103 7409                    	jz	short sd_ctp
 33060 00003105 2EC706[5D1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 33061                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 33062 0000310C EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 33063                                  sd_ctp:	
 33064                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33065                                  ;szdev1:
 33066 0000310E B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 33067 00003110 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 33068 00003112 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 33069 00003114 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 33070 00003116 09D0                    	or	ax,dx ; * ; cf=0
 33071                                  	;
 33072                                  	; 22/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimized)
 33073                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h 
 33074                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33075                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33076                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 33077                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33078                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33079                                  	;clc
 33080                                  ;szdev2:
 33081 00003118 2EA3[5D1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size (in paragraps)
 33082                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33083                                  	;clc ; cf=0 ; *	; CLC is not needed here
 33084                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 33085                                  
 33086                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33087                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33088                                  	; cf=0
 33089                                  	;clc
 33090                                  sd_close:
 33091 0000311C 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 33092                                  					;  carry flag
 33093 0000311D B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close

 33095 00003122 9D                      	popf
 33096                                  sd_err:
 33097                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33098                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 33100 00003124 C3                      	retn

 33104                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 33105                                  ;
 33106                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 33107                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 33108                                  ;
 33109                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 33110                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 33111                                  ;
 33112                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 33113                                  ;

 33115                                  
 33116                                  	; 01/11/2022
 33117                                  ExecDev:
 33118 00003125 2E8B1E[5F1F]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]

 33120                                  					;  block for exec with
 33121                                  					;  load address

 33131                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 33132                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 33133                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 33134                                  		; AL = subfunction

 33177                                  ; procedure : RemoveNull

 33476                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33477                                  ;
 33478                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33479                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33480                                  ;
 33481                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 33482                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33483                                  ;
 33484                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33485                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33486                                  ;
 33487                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33488                                  
 33489                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33490                                  
 33491                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33492                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33493

 33495                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33496                                  GetHexNum:

 33498 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33499                                  ghn_next:
 33500 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33501 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33502 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33503 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33504 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33505 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 33506 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33507 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 33508 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 33509                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33510 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33511 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33512 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33513                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33514                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33515 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33516                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33517                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33518                                  ghn_shift1:
 33519 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33520 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33521 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33522 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33523 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 33524 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33525                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33526 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33527 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33528 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33529 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err

 33551                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary

 33554                                  ;

 33576 00003277 C3                      	retn

 33598                                  ;
 33599                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33600                                  ;
 33601                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33602                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33603                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33604                                  ;			; DS = data
 33605                                  ;
 33606                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33607                                  ;
 33608                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33609                                  ;
 33610                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33611                                  
 33612                                  umb_insert:
 33613 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 33614

 33624                                  ui_next:
 33625 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33626                                  					;    new block

 33629                                  					;    last

 33632                                  					; N: get next block

 33637                                  
 33638                                  ui_insert:
 33639 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33640 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33641

 33658                                  					; mark as free
 33659 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33660                                  					; start & end of new block
 33661 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33662                                  
 33663                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33664                                  	
 33665 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx

 33669

 33671                                  					; this block

 33673                                  	
 33674 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33675 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33676 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33677 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33678                                  
 33679 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33680                                  
 33681                                  ui_append:

 33683 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para

 33685                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33686                                  					; block for the next arena.

 33688 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal

 33693                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33694 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33695                                  
 33696 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33697                                  
 33698 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33699 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33700 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33701 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33702

 33707                                  					; mark as free
 33708 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33709 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33710                                  ui_done:
 33711                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33712 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 33713                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33714                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33715                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023

 33742                                  ;	retn
 33743                                  
 33744                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33745                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 33746                                  
 33747                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33748                                  
 33749                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33750                                  
 33751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33752                                  ;
 33753                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33754                                  ;
 33755                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33756                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33757                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33758                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33759                                  ;
 33760                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33761                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33762                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 33763                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33764                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33765                                  ;
 33766                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33767                                  
 33768                                  umb_coalesce:
 33769                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33770                                  	; ds = cs
 33771 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33772                                  
 33773 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33774                                  
 33775                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33776                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33777 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33778 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33779                                  uc_nextfree:
 33780 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33781 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33782                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33783 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33784 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33785                                  					; N: get next arena
 33786 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33787 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33788 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33789                                  uc_again:
 33790 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33791 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33792                                  uc_check:
 33793 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33794 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33795                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33796 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33797 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33798                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33799 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33800 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33801 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33802 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33803                                  
 33804                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33805                                  ;uc_done:
 33806                                  	;retn

 33858                                  ;

 33861                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33862                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33863                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33864                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33865                                  ;				NC
 33866                                  ;			  else 
 33867                                  ;				CY
 33868                                  ;
 33869                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX

 33874                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33879                                  					;   possible
 33880                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33883                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33884                                  					; the largest UMB

 33889

 33897 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33898                                  ua_err:

 33900                                  
 33901                                  	;clc
 33902                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33903                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33904                                  	; cf=0
 33905                                  	;clc 
 33906                                  ua_done:
 33907 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 33908 000033C9 C3                      	retn

 33932 000033D8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 33954                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33955                                  	; ds = cs

 33958

 33960                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 33961

 33963                                  	; ds = cs
 33964

 33966 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6

 33968

 33970 000033EA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33971                                  
 33972 000033EC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33973                                  
 33974                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33975                                  	; 09/09/2023

 33978

 33980 000033F7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33981

 33989 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33990                                  					; mark as free 
 33991 00003418 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33992 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 33994                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33995                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33997                                  	; 18/09/2023
 33998 00003422 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 33999                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34000                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34001                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 34004                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena

 34010 0000342C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34011                                  ;scan_next

 34013                                  scannext:
 34014 0000342E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34015 00003432 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34016

 34019 0000343B 40                      	inc	ax
 34020 0000343C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34021                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34022                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34023 0000343E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34024                                  got_last:
 34025                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34026                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34027 00003440 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34028                                  
 34029 00003445 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34030                                  	;clc
 34031                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34032                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34033                                  	; cf=0
 34034                                  	;clc
 34035 0000344B C3                      	retn
 34036                                  
 34037                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34038                                  ;;lfu_err:

 34044                                  ;	retn

 34047                                  ;
 34048                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34049                                  ;
 34050                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34051                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34052                                  ;
 34053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34054                                  
 34055                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34056                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34057                                  	; ds = cs
 34058 0000344C 833E[6D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34059                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34060 00003451 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34061 00003453 06                      	push	es
 34062                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34063                                  	;push	bx
 34064                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34065                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34066                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34067                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34068 00003454 8B1E[711F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34069 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34070 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34071                                  	
 34072 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34073 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 34074                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34075                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34076                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34077 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34078 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 34079 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34080 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34081                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34082                                  	;pop	bx
 34083 00003471 07                      	pop	es
 34084                                  su_exit:
 34085 00003472 C3                      	retn

 34095                                  UnlinkUMB:
 34096                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34097                                  	; ds = cs
 34098 00003473 1E                      	push	ds
 34099 00003474 06                      	push	es
 34100                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34101 00003475 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 34102                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34103 0000347A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34104                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34105 0000347C 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34106                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34107 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34108 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34109                                  ulu_next:
 34110 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34111 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34112 0000348F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34113 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34114 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34115 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34116                                  ulu_found:
 34117                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34118 00003497 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34119                                  ulu_x:
 34120 0000349C 07                      	pop	es
 34121 0000349D 1F                      	pop	ds
 34122 0000349E C3                      	retn

 34124                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34125                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34126                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34127                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34128                                  
 34129                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34130                                  ;
 34131                                  ; Summary:
 34132                                  ;
 34133                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34134                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34135                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34136                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34137                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34138                                  ;
 34139                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34140                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34141                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34142                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34143                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34144                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34145                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34146                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34147                                  ;
 34148                                  ; Example:
 34149                                  ;
 34150                                  ;   [menu]
 34151                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34152                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34153                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34154                                  ;
 34155                                  ;   [network]
 34156                                  ;   include misc
 34157                                  ;   device=foo
 34158                                  ;
 34159                                  ;   [misc]
 34160                                  ;   device=bar
 34161                                  ;   include alternate
 34162                                  ;
 34163                                  ;   [alternate]
 34164                                  ;   device=tar
 34165                                  ;
 34166                                  ;
 34167                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34168                                  ;
 34169                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34170                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34171                                  ;
 34172                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34173                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34174                                  ;   following order:
 34175                                  ;
 34176                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34177                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34178                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34179                                  ;
 34180                                  
 34181                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34182                                  
 34183                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34184                                  
 34185                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34186                                  
 34187                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34188                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34189                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34190                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34191                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34192                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34193                                  
 34194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34195                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34196                                  
 34197                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34198                                  
 34199                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34200                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34201                                  
 34202 0000349F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34203                                  
 34204                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34205                                  ;
 34206                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34207                                  ;
 34208                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34209                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34210                                  ;
 34211                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34212

 34352                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34353                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34354                                  
 34355                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34356

 34358                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34359                                  
 34360                                  nextswtch:
 34361                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34362                                  	je	short done_line
 34363                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34364                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34365                                  
 34366                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34367

 34428                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34429                                  ;
 34430                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34431                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34432                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34433                                  ; error.

 34444                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34445 00003504 C3                      	retn

 34526                                  ; procedure : process_num
 34527                                  ;
 34528                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 34529                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 34530                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 34531                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 34532                                  ;
 34533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34554 00003562 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 34555

 34557                                  
 34558                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 34559 00003564 A2[3448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 34560                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34561                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 34562                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34563                                  	; cf=0
 34564 00003567 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 34565                                  try_t:
 34566 00003568 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 34567 0000356A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 34568                                  	; 12/12/2022

 34571 0000356F 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 34572

 34575                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34576                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 34577                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34578                                  	; cf=0

 34580                                  try_s:
 34581                                  	; 12/12/2022

 34584 00003578 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 34585 0000357A A3[5949]                	mov	[slim],ax

 34702                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34703                                  ;
 34704                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34705                                  ;
 34706                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34707                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34708                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34709                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34710                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34711                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34712                                  ;
 34713                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34714                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34715                                  ;
 34716                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34717                                  ;
 34718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34719                                  
 34720                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34721                                  
 34722                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34723                                  
 34724                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34725                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 34726

 34808 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 34809                                  
 34810                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34811                                  
 34812 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34813                                  
 34814                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34815                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34816                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34817                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34818                                  
 34819                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34820                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34821                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34822                                  
 34823 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 34824 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 34825 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34826 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34827

 34829                                  
 34830 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34831                                  
 34832                                  ;	check for 320K
 34833                                  
 34834                                  not_144m:

 34836 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid

 34838 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 34839

 34841 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediaid
 34842

 34845                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34846

 34848 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34849                                  
 34850                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34851                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34852                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch

 34858

 34860

 34870

 35429                                  ;
 35430                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35431                                  ;
 35432                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35433                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35434                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35435                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35436                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35437                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35438                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35439                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35440                                  ;
 35441                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35442                                  
 35443                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35444                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35445                                  
 35446                                  skip_comment:
 35447 0000386C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35448                                  
 35449                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35450                                  	; ds = cs	
 35451                                  
 35452 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35453                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35454 00003873 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35455                                  
 35456 00003875 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35457                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35458 0000387A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35459                                  
 35460 0000387C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35461                                  	
 35462 0000387F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35463                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35464 00003883 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35465                                  
 35466 00003885 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35467                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35468 0000388A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35469                                  
 35470 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35471                                  	
 35472 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35473                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35474 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35475                                  skip_cmmt:
 35476 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35477 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35478 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 35479 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 35480 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35481 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35482                                  no_commt:
 35483 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 35493                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35494                                  ;
 35495                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35496                                  ;
 35497                                  ;   INPUT
 35498                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35499                                  ;
 35500                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35501                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35504                                  ;       All
 35505                                  ;
 35506                                  ;   HISTORY
 35507                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35508                                  ;
 35509                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35510                                  
 35511                                  kbd_read:
 35512 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35513 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35514                                  
 35515 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35516 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35517 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35518                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35519                                  kbd_loop:
 35520 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35521 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35522 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35523 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35524 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35525 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35526 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35527 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35528                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35529                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35530 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35531                                  
 35532 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35533 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35534                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35535 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35536                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35537 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35538 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35539 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35540 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35541 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35542 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 35543 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 35544                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35545 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35546                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35547 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35548 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35549 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35550 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35551 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35552                                  
 35553                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35554 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35555 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35556                                  	
 35557 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35558 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35559                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35560 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35561 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 35562                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35563 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 35564 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35565                                  kbd_notf5:
 35566                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35567 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35568 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35569                                  
 35570 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35571 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35572                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35573 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35574 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 35575 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35576 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35577                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35578 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 35579 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35580 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35581 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 35582 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35583                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35584 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35585 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35586                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35587 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35588 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35589 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 35590                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35591 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35592 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 35593                                  
 35594                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35595                                  ;
 35596                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35597                                  ;
 35598                                  ;   INPUT
 35599                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35600                                  ;
 35601                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35602                                  ;       None
 35603                                  ;
 35604                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35605                                  ;       None
 35606                                  ;
 35607                                  ;   HISTORY
 35608                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35609                                  ;
 35610                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35611                                  
 35612                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35613                                  
 35614                                  set_numlock:
 35615                                          ; 04/01/2023
 35616                                  	;push	ax
 35617 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 35618 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 35619 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 35620 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35621 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35622 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 35623 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35624 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 35625                                  not_off:
 35626 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35627 00003945 F9                              stc
 35628 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 35629 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 35630                                  set_done:
 35631 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 35632                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35633                                  	;pop	ax
 35634 0000394E C3                              retn
 35635                                  
 35636                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35637                                  
 35638                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35639                                  ;
 35640                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35641                                  ;
 35642                                  ;   INPUT
 35643                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35644                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35645                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35646                                  ;
 35647                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35648                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35649                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35650                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35651                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35652                                  ;
 35653                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35654                                  ;       All
 35655                                  ;
 35656                                  ;   NOTES
 35657                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35658                                  ;
 35659                                  ;   HISTORY
 35660                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35661                                  ;
 35662                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35663                                  
 35664                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35665                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 35666                                  
 35667                                  menu_check:
 35668                                  
 35669                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 35670                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35671                                  
 35672 0000394F 51                              push    cx              ;
 35673 00003950 56                              push    si              ;
 35674 00003951 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35675                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35676 00003953 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35677 00003956 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35678 00003958 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 35679 0000395A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35680 0000395C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35681 0000395D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35682                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35683 0000395F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35684 00003961 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35685 00003963 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35686 00003965 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35687 00003967 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35688 0000396A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35689 0000396F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35690                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35691 00003971 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35692 00003973 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35693                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35694 00003975 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35695                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35696 00003978 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35697 0000397A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35698 0000397C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35699 0000397E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35700 00003980 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 35701 00003983 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35702 00003985 3A06[B91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35703 00003989 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35704 0000398B 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35705 00003990 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35706                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35707 00003992 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35708 00003996 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35709 00003998 800E[FF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35710 0000399D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35711                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 35712 0000399F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35713 000039A2 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 35714                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 35715 000039A4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35716 000039A5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35717                                  
 35718                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 35719                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 35720                                  
 35721 000039A6 F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35722 000039AB 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 35723                                  ;
 35724                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35725                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 35726                                  ;
 35727 000039AD E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 35728 000039B0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 35729 000039B2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 35730                                  
 35731                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 35732                                  
 35733                                  menu_search:
 35734 000039B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 35735 000039B7 BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 35736 000039BA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 35737 000039BD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 35738 000039BF C606[3C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 35739 000039C4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 35740                                  
 35741                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 35742                                  
 35743                                  menu_color:
 35744 000039C7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 35745 000039C8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 35746                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 35747                                  	; 10/09/2023
 35748                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 35749 000039C9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 35750 000039CC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35751 000039CF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35752                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 35753                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 35754                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 35755                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 35756 000039D1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 35757 000039D3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 35758 000039D6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 35759 000039D8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 35760 000039DB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 35761 000039DE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 35762                                  	; 10/09/2023
 35763                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 35764 000039E0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 35765 000039E2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 35766 000039E4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 35767                                  check_color:
 35768 000039E6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 35769 000039E8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 35770 000039EA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35771                                  set_color:
 35772 000039ED 8816[FA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 35773 000039F1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 35774 000039F2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 35775 000039F3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 35776                                  
 35777                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 35778                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 35779                                  
 35780                                  menu_found:
 35781 000039F6 C606[0447]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 35782                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 35783 000039FB C606[0847]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35784 00003A00 8026[0347]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 35785                                  	; 10/09/2023
 35786 00003A05 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 35787 00003A07 8916[0647]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 35788
