 35789 00003A0B E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 35790                                  	; 10/09/2023
 35791                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 35792                                  
 35793                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 35794                                  
 35795                                  menu_process:
 35796 00003A0E E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35797 00003A11 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 35798 00003A13 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35799 00003A15 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 35800 00003A17 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 35801 00003A19 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35802 00003A1B 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 35803 00003A1D 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 35804 00003A1F 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 35805 00003A21 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 35806 00003A23 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 35807 00003A25 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 35808 00003A27 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 35809 00003A29 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35810 00003A2B 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 35811 00003A2D 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 35812 00003A2F 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35813 00003A31 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 35814 00003A34 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35815 00003A36 F9                              stc                     ;
 35816 00003A37 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 35817 00003A3A EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35818                                  menu_numlock:
 35819 00003A3C E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 35820 00003A3F EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35821                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 35822 00003A41 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 35823                                  
 35824                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 35825                                  
 35826                                  menu_default:
 35827 00003A43 8936[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 35828 00003A47 803E[0947]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 35829 00003A4C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 35830 00003A4E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 35831 00003A51 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 35832 00003A53 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 35833 00003A56 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 35834 00003A58 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 35835 00003A5A E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 35836 00003A5D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 35837                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35838 00003A60 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 35839 00003A62 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 35840                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 35841 00003A64 881E[0847]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 35842                                  timeout_skip:
 35843 00003A68 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35844                                  
 35845                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35846                                  
 35847                                  menu_item:
 35848                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 35849 00003A6A 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 35850 00003A6D 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 35851 00003A6F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 35852 00003A71 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 35853 00003A74 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 35854 00003A76 F9                              stc                     ;
 35855 00003A77 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 35856 00003A7A EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 35857                                  
 35858                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35859                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 35860                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 35861                                  
 35862                                  menu_itemfound:
 35863 00003A7C 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 35864 00003A7D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 35865 00003A7F 8887[0A47]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 35866 00003A83 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 35867                                  
 35868                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 35869                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 35870                                  ;   description...
 35871                                  
 35872 00003A85 89B7[1447]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 35873 00003A89 89B7[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 35874 00003A8D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 35875 00003A8F E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 35876 00003A92 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35877 00003A94 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 35878 00003A97 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35879 00003A99 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 35880 00003A9B 89BF[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 35881                                  
 35882                                  menu_nextitem:
 35883 00003A9F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35884 00003AA2 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 35885                                  
 35886                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 35887                                  
 35888                                  menu_getdefault:
 35889 00003AA5 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 35890 00003AA7 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 35891 00003AA9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 35892 00003AAB E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 35893                                  menu_valid:
 35894 00003AAE 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 35895 00003AB0 8816[0547]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 35896 00003AB4 8B3E[0647]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 35897 00003AB8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 35898 00003ABA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 35899 00003ABC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 35900                                  menu_chkdefault:
 35901 00003ABD 53                              push    bx              ;
 35902 00003ABE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35903 00003AC0 8BB7[1447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35904 00003AC4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 35905 00003AC7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35906 00003AC8 06                              push    es              ;
 35907 00003AC9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35908 00003ACA E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 35909 00003ACD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35910 00003ACE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35911 00003ACF 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 35912 00003AD1 43                              inc     bx              ;
 35913 00003AD2 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 35914 00003AD6 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 35915                                  menu_nodefault:
 35916 00003AD8 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 35917                                  menu_setdefault:
 35918 00003ADA 881E[0447]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 35919                                  
 35920                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 35921                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 35922                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 35923                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 35924                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 35925                                  ;   with no timeout)
 35926                                  
 35927 00003ADE 803E[0847]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 35928 00003AE3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 35929 00003AE5 F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 35930 00003AEA 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 35931 00003AEC E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 35932                                  
 35933                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 35934                                  
 35935                                  menu_display:
 35936 00003AEF B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 35937 00003AF1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35938 00003AF3 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 35939 00003AF5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35940 00003AF7 06                              push    es              ;
 35941 00003AF8 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 35942 00003AFB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 35943 00003AFD 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 35944 00003B01 A3[0147]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 35945 00003B04 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 35946 00003B08 A2[0047]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 35947 00003B0B A1[FB46]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 35948 00003B0E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35949 00003B10 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 35950 00003B13 8A3E[FA46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 35951 00003B17 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 35952                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 35953 00003B19 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 35954 00003B1E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 35955                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 35956 00003B20 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 35957 00003B25 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 35958 00003B27 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 35959 00003B29 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 35960                                  menu_clear:
 35961 00003B2D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 35962 00003B2F 07                              pop     es              ;
 35963 00003B30 8836[FE46]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 35964 00003B34 BA[124C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 35965 00003B37 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 35966                                  
 35967 00003B3A F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35968 00003B3F 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 35969 00003B41 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35970 00003B45 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 35971 00003B49 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 35972 00003B4B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 35973 00003B4D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35974 00003B4F BA[604C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 35975 00003B52 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 35976 00003B55 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 35977 00003B57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35978 00003B59 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35979 00003B5C 8816[FD46]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35980                                  
 35981                                  menu_nostatus:
 35982 00003B60 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35983                                  menu_disploop:
 35984 00003B63 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35985 00003B66 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35986 00003B67 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35987 00003B6B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35988                                  
 35989                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35990                                  
 35991 00003B6D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35992 00003B6F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 35993 00003B71 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 35994 00003B74 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35995 00003B78 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35996 00003B7A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35997                                  
 35998 00003B7C BA[4D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 35999 00003B7F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36000 00003B82 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36001 00003B85 BA[1E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36002 00003B88 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36003 00003B8B FF36[FF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36004 00003B8F 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36005 00003B94 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36006 00003B97 8F06[FF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36007                                  
 36008                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36009                                  
 36010                                  menu_autoselect:
 36011 00003B9B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36012 00003B9E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36013 00003BA0 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36014                                  menu_abort:
 36015 00003BA3 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36016 00003BA5 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36017                                  
 36018                                  normal_boot:
 36019 00003BA8 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36020 00003BAB 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36021 00003BAD 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36022 00003BB1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36023 00003BB3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36024                                  
 36025                                  not_topmenu:
 36026 00003BB6 80BF[0A47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36027 00003BBB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36028 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36029 00003BBF 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36030 00003BC3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36031 00003BC6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36032 00003BC8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36033 00003BCA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36034                                  
 36035                                  not_submenu:
 36036 00003BCD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36037 00003BCF 8B9F[1447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36038                                  
 36039                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36040                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36041                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36042                                  
 36043                                  no_selection:
 36044 00003BD3 891E[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36045 00003BD7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36046 00003BDB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36047 00003BDD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36048 00003BDE 8E1E[B614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36049 00003BE2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36050                                  
 36051                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36052                                  ;
 36053                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36054                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36055                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36056                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36057                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36058                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36059                                  ;
 36060                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36061                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36062                                  
 36063                                  copyblock_loop:
 36064 00003BE4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36065 00003BE5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36066 00003BE8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36067 00003BE9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36068                                  
 36069                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36070                                  
 36071                                  copyblock_begin:
 36072                                  
 36073                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36074                                  %if 0
 36075                                          push    ax              ;
 36076                                          push    cx              ;
 36077                                          push    si              ;
 36078                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36079                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36080                                          push    ds              ;
 36081                                          push    cs              ;
 36082                                          pop     ds              ;
 36083                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36084                                          pop     ds              ;
 36085                                          pop     di              ;
 36086                                          pop     si              ;
 36087                                          pop     cx              ;
 36088                                          pop     ax              ;
 36089                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36090                                  %endif
 36091                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36092 00003BEB 57                      	push	di
 36093 00003BEC BF[4947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36094 00003BEF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36095 00003BF2 5F                      	pop	di
 36096 00003BF3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36097                                  
 36098 00003BF5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36099 00003BF7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36100 00003BF9 57                              push    di              ;
 36101 00003BFA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36102 00003BFC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36103 00003BFD 06                              push    es              ;
 36104 00003BFE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36105 00003BFF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36106 00003C02 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36107 00003C03 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36108                                  copyblock_check:
 36109 00003C04 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36110 00003C06 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36111 00003C08 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36112 00003C0B EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36113                                  
 36114                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36115 00003C0D E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36116 00003C10 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36117 00003C13 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36118 00003C15 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36119 00003C17 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36120 00003C19 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36121 00003C1B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36122                                  ;
 36123                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36124                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36125                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36126                                  ;
 36127                                  move_config:
 36128 00003C1D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36129 00003C1F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36130                                  ;
 36131                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36132                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36133                                  ;
 36134                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36135 00003C20 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36136 00003C23 BE[3C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36137 00003C26 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36138                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36139                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36140                                  copy_boot: 
 36141                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36142 00003C27 2E                              cs
 36143 00003C28 AC                      	lodsb
 36144 00003C29 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36145 00003C2B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36146 00003C2C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36147                                  
 36148 00003C2E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36149                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36150                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36151 00003C2F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36152 00003C31 2E8B36[0647]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36153 00003C36 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36154 00003C38 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36155 00003C3A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36156 00003C3B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36157 00003C3C BE[4947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36158 00003C3F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36159 00003C42 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36160 00003C45 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36161 00003C47 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36162 00003C49 46                              inc     si              ;
 36163 00003C4A 47                              inc     di              ;
 36164 00003C4B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36165 00003C4D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36166 00003C50 07                              pop     es              ;
 36167                                  
 36168                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36169                                  
 36170 00003C51 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36171 00003C53 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36172 00003C58 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36173 00003C5A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36174                                  
 36175 00003C5B 51                              push    cx              ;
 36176 00003C5C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36177 00003C5E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36178 00003C5F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36179 00003C61 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36180                                  
 36181                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36182                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36183                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36184                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36185                                  ;   is empty.
 36186                                  
 36187 00003C62 06                              push    es              ;
 36188 00003C63 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36189 00003C65 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36190 00003C66 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36191 00003C6C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36192 00003C6F 07                              pop     es
 36193                                  
 36194                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36195                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36196                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36197                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36198                                  
 36199                                  menu_done:
 36200 00003C70 803E[FB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36201 00003C75 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36202 00003C77 06                              push    es              ;
 36203 00003C78 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36204 00003C7B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36205 00003C7D A1[0147]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36206 00003C80 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36207 00003C84 A0[0047]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36208 00003C87 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36209 00003C8B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36210                                  menu_exit:
 36211 00003C8C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36212 00003C90 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36213                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36214                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36215                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36216                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36217 00003C94 C3                      	retn
 36218                                  
 36219                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36220                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36221                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36222                                  
 36223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36224                                  ;
 36225                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36226                                  ;
 36227                                  ;   INPUT
 36228                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36229                                  ;
 36230                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36231                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36232                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36233                                  ;
 36234                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36235                                  ;       None
 36236                                  ;
 36237                                  ;   NOTES
 36238                                  ;       None
 36239                                  ;
 36240                                  ;   HISTORY
 36241                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36242                                  ;
 36243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36244                                  
 36245                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36246                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36247                                  
 36248                                  copy_envvar:
 36249 00003C95 51                              push    cx              ;
 36250 00003C96 56                              push    si              ;
 36251 00003C97 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36252 00003C98 06                              push    es              ;
 36253 00003C99 06                              push    es              ;
 36254 00003C9A 8E06[B614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36255 00003C9E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36256                                  
 36257                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36258                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36259                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36260                                  ;
 36261                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36262                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36263                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36264                                  
 36265 00003C9F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36266                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36267 00003CA1 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36268 00003CA2 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36269                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36270 00003CA4 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36271 00003CA6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36272                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36273 00003CA8 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36274 00003CAA 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36275                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36276 00003CAC 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36277 00003CAE 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36278 00003CAF 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36279 00003CB1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36280 00003CB3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36281 00003CB5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36282 00003CB7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36283 00003CB9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36284 00003CBA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36285                                  copy_varsrch:
 36286 00003CBC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36287 00003CBF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36288 00003CC1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36289 00003CC3 51                              push    cx              ;
 36290 00003CC4 56                              push    si              ;
 36291 00003CC5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36292 00003CC7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36293 00003CC8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36294 00003CC9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36295 00003CCB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36296 00003CCF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36297                                  
 36298                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36299                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36300                                  
 36301 00003CD1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36302 00003CD4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36303 00003CD6 56                              push    si              ;
 36304 00003CD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36305 00003CD9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36306 00003CDB 2E8B0E[B414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36307 00003CE0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36308                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36309                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36310                                  
 36311 00003CE2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36312 00003CE3 26                      	es	; 26h
 36313 00003CE4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36314                                  
 36315 00003CE5 5E                      	pop     si
 36316                                  copy_envprep:
 36317 00003CE6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36318 00003CE9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36319 00003CEB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36320 00003CEE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36321                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36322                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36323                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36324 00003CF0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36325 00003CF1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36326 00003CF3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36327 00003CF5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36328 00003CF7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36329 00003CF9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36330 00003CFA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36331                                  
 36332                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36333 00003CFC 51                              push    cx              ;
 36334 00003CFD B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36335 00003D00 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36336 00003D02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36337 00003D03 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36338                                  
 36339                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36340                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36341                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36342                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36343                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36344                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36345                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36346                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36347                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36348                                  
 36349                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36350 00003D05 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36351 00003D07 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36352                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36353 00003D08 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36354 00003D0B 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36355                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 36356 00003D10 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 36357                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36358 00003D11 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 36359 00003D12 07                              pop     es              ;
 36360 00003D13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36361 00003D14 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36362 00003D15 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36363                                  
 36364                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36365 00003D16 C3                              retn
 36366                                  
 36367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36368                                  ;
 36369                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36370                                  ;
 36371                                  ;   INPUT
 36372                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36373                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36374                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36375                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36376                                  ;
 36377                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36378                                  ;       Same as above
 36379                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36380                                  ;
 36381                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36382                                  ;       All
 36383                                  ;
 36384                                  ;   NOTES
 36385                                  ;       None
 36386                                  ;
 36387                                  ;   HISTORY
 36388                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36389                                  ;
 36390                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36391                                  
 36392                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36393                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36394                                  
 36395                                  copy_block:
 36396 00003D17 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36397 00003D1A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36398 00003D1C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36399 00003D1E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36400 00003D20 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36401                                  
 36402 00003D22 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36403 00003D24 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36404 00003D26 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36405                                  
 36406                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36407                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36408                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36409                                  
 36410 00003D28 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36411 00003D2D 57                              push    di              ;
 36412                                  
 36413 00003D2E BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36414 00003D31 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36415 00003D34 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36416                                  
 36417 00003D36 BF[4947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36418 00003D39 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36419 00003D3C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36420                                  
 36421 00003D3E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36422 00003D40 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36423 00003D43 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36424                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36425                                  	;pop    di              ;
 36426 00003D45 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36427 00003D47 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 36428 00003D48 51                              push    cx              ;
 36429 00003D49 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36430 00003D4B 56                              push    si              ;
 36431 00003D4C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36432 00003D4D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36433 00003D4F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36434 00003D52 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36435 00003D55 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36436 00003D56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36437 00003D57 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36438 00003D59 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36439                                  
 36440                                  copy_error:
 36441                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36442 00003D5B F8                      	clc
 36443                                  copy_skip:
 36444 00003D5C 5F                              pop     di
 36445                                  ;copy_error:
 36446                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 36447                                  	;clc                    ;
 36448 00003D5D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36449 00003D60 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36450                                  
 36451                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36452                                  
 36453                                  copy_line:
 36454 00003D62 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36455 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 36456 00003D65 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36457 00003D67 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36458 00003D69 2E803E[B914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36459 00003D6F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36460 00003D71 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36461 00003D74 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36462 00003D76 47                              inc     di              ;
 36463 00003D77 47                              inc     di              ;
 36464 00003D78 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36465                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36466 00003D7A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 36467 00003D7D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36468 00003D7F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36469 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 36470                                  copy_next:
 36471 00003D82 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36472 00003D84 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36473                                  
 36474                                  copy_nextline:
 36475 00003D86 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36476 00003D89 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36477                                  
 36478                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36479                                  ;copy_done:
 36480                                          ;retn
 36481                                  
 36482                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36483                                  ;
 36484                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36485                                  ;
 36486                                  ;   INPUT
 36487                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36488                                  ;
 36489                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36490                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36491                                  ;
 36492                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36493                                  ;       DX
 36494                                  ;
 36495                                  ;   NOTES
 36496                                  ;       None
 36497                                  ;
 36498                                  ;   HISTORY
 36499                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36500                                  ;
 36501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36502                                  
 36503                                  get_linenum:
 36504 00003D8B 50                              push    ax              ;
 36505 00003D8C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36506 00003D8E 51                              push    cx              ;
 36507 00003D8F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36508 00003D91 56                              push    si              ;
 36509 00003D92 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36510 00003D97 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36511                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36512 00003D99 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 36513 00003D9C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36514 00003D9E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36515 00003D9F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36516 00003DA1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36517                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36518 00003DA3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36519 00003DA4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36520 00003DA5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36521 00003DA6 C3                              retn
 36522                                  
 36523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36524                                  ;
 36525                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36526                                  ;
 36527                                  ;   INPUT
 36528                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36529                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36530                                  ;
 36531                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36532                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36533                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36534                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36535                                  ;
 36536                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36537                                  ;       None
 36538                                  ;
 36539                                  ;   NOTES
 36540                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36541                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36542                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36543                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36544                                  ;
 36545                                  ;   HISTORY
 36546                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36547                                  ;
 36548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36549                                  
 36550                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36551 00003DA7 50                              push    ax              ;
 36552 00003DA8 51                              push    cx              ;
 36553 00003DA9 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36554 00003DAE 56                              push    si              ;
 36555 00003DAF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36556 00003DB1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36557 00003DB2 06                              push    es              ;
 36558 00003DB3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36559 00003DB4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 36560 00003DB7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 36561 00003DB9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 36562 00003DBB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36563 00003DBC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36564 00003DBD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36565 00003DBE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36566                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36567 00003DBF C3                              retn			;
 36568                                  
 36569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36570                                  ;
 36571                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36572                                  ;
 36573                                  ;   INPUT
 36574                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36575                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36576                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36577                                  ;
 36578                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36579                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36580                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36581                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36582                                  ;
 36583                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36584                                  ;       AX
 36585                                  ;
 36586                                  ;   NOTES
 36587                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 36588                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 36589                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 36590                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 36591                                  ;
 36592                                  ;   HISTORY
 36593                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36594                                  ;
 36595                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36596                                  
 36597                                  find_block:
 36598 00003DC0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 36599 00003DC3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 36600 00003DC5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 36601 00003DC7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 36602 00003DC9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 36603 00003DCB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 36604 00003DCD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 36605 00003DCF 2E800E[B914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36606 00003DD5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 36607                                  check_line:
 36608 00003DD7 2E800E[B914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36609 00003DDD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 36610 00003DE0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 36611                                  next_line:
 36612 00003DE2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 36613 00003DE5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 36614                                  ;find_exit:
 36615                                  ;	retn
 36616                                  
 36617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36618                                  ;
 36619                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 36620                                  ;
 36621                                  ;   INPUT
 36622                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 36623                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36624                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36625                                  ;
 36626                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36627                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 36628                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36629                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36630                                  ;
 36631                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36632                                  ;       AX
 36633                                  ;
 36634                                  ;   NOTES
 36635                                  ;       None
 36636                                  ;
 36637                                  ;   HISTORY
 36638                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36639                                  ;
 36640                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36641                                  
 36642                                  comp_names:
 36643 00003DE7 57                              push    di              ;
 36644                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 36645 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 36646 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 36647 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 36648 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 36649 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 36650 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 36651 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 36652                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 36653 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 36654 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 36655 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 36656                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 36657 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36658 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 36659                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 36660 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 36661 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 36662 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 36663 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 36664                                  
 36665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36666                                  
 36667                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36668                                  comp_names_x:
 36669                                  	;
 36670                                  comp_names_safe:
 36671 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 36672 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 36673 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 36674 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 36675 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 36676 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 36677 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 36678 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 36679 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 36680 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 36681 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 36682 00003E15 C3                              retn
 36683                                  
 36684                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36685                                  ;
 36686                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 36687                                  ;
 36688                                  ;   INPUT
 36689                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 36690                                  ;
 36691                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36692                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 36693                                  ;
 36694                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36695                                  ;       None
 36696                                  ;
 36697                                  ;   NOTES
 36698                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 36699                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 36700                                  ;
 36701                                  ;   HISTORY
 36702                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36703                                  ;
 36704                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36705                                  
 36706                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36707                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 36708                                  
 36709                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 36710 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 36711 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 36712 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
 36713 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 36714 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 36715 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36716 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 36717 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 36718 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 36719 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36720 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36721 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 36722 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 36723 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 36724 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36725 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 36726 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 36727 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 36728 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36729 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 36730 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 36731 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 36732 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 36733 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 36734 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36735 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36736                                  print_other:                    ;
 36737 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 36738 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36739 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 36740 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 36741 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 36742 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 36743 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 36744 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36745 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36746 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36747 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36748                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 36749 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 36750 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 36751 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36752 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36753 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36754                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 36755 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 36756 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 36757 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36758 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36759 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36760 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 36761                                  print_loop:                     ;
 36762 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 36763 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 36764 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 36765 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 36766 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 36767                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 36768 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 36769 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 36770 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 36771 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 36772 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 36773 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36774 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36775 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 36776 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 36777 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36778 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36779 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 36780                                  print_done:                     ;
 36781 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 36782 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36783 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36784 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 36785 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36786 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36787 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36788 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36789 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36790 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 36791                                  
 36792                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36793                                  ;
 36794                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 36795                                  ;
 36796                                  ;   INPUT
 36797                                  ;       None
 36798                                  ;
 36799                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36800                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 36801                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 36802                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 36803                                  ;
 36804                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36805                                  ;       None
 36806                                  ;
 36807                                  ;   NOTES
 36808                                  ;       None
 36809                                  ;
 36810                                  ;   HISTORY
 36811                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36812                                  ;
 36813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36814                                  
 36815                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 36816 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 36817 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36818 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 36819 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 36820 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36821 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 36822 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 36823 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36824 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 36825                                  check_time:
 36826 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 36827 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 36828 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 36829 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 36830 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 36831 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 36832                                  show_time:
