 36833 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 36834 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 36835 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36836 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36837 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36838 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 36839 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 36840 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36841 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36842 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 36843 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 36844 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 36845 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 36846 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 36847 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 36848 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 36849 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36850 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36851 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36852 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 36853 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36854 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36855 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36856 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 36857 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 36858 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36859 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36860                                  input_key:
 36861 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 36862 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 36863 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36864 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 36865 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 36866 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 36867 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 36868 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 36869 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 36870 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 36871 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 36872 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 36873 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 36874                                  got_time:
 36875 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 36876 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 36877 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 36878 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 36879                                  got_key:
 36880 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 36881 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 36882 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 36883 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 36884 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 36885 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 36886 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36887 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36888 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 36889 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 36890 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 36891                                  
 36892                                  timeout_disabled:
 36893 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36894 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 36895 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 36896 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 36897 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36898                                  
 36899 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36900 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 36901 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36902 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36903 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36904 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36905 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36906 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 36907                                  not_up:
 36908 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36909 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 36910 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36911 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36912 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36913 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36914 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36915                                  print1: 
 36916 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 36917                                  print2: 
 36918 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 36919 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 36920                                  to_input_key:
 36921 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 36922                                  not_down:
 36923 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36924 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36925 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36926 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 36927 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36928 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 36929 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 36930                                  not_f8:
 36931 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36932 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36933                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36934                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 36935                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 36936 00003FA7 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 36937 00003FAC BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36938 00003FAF B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36939 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36940                                  
 36941                                  normal_key:
 36942 00003FB3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36943 00003FB5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 36944 00003FB7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36945 00003FB9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36946 00003FBB BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36947 00003FBE C3                              retn			;
 36948                                  not_backspace:
 36949 00003FBF 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36950 00003FC1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36951 00003FC3 3A06[0547]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36952 00003FC7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36953 00003FC9 A2[0447]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36954 00003FCC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36955 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36956 00003FD1 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 36957                                  
 36958                                  select_done:

 36960 00003FD5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36961 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36962                                  
 36963                                  	; fall into disp_input
 36964

 36969                                  ;   disp_input: display a single character + cr/lf

 36973                                  ;

 36976                                  ;

 36979                                  ;
 36980                                  ;   NOTES

 36982                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36983                                  ;

 36995 00003FDA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h

 36997 00003FDE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 36998                                  disp_ok:
 36999 00003FE0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37000                                  disp_input_ok:

 37002 00003FE4 CD21                    	int	21h
 37003 00003FE6 BA[1E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37004 00003FE9 E8E504                  	call	print
 37005 00003FEC 58                      	pop	ax
 37006 00003FED C3                      	retn

 37029                                  ;

 37041                                  show_status:
 37042 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37043 00003FFF 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 37049 0000400E F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37050 00004013 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off

 37053 00004019 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37054 0000401C B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 37055                                  	; 10/09/2023

 37057 0000401F EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 37058                                  show_onoff: 
 37059 00004021 CD10                            int     10h
 37060                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37061                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37062                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37063                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37064

 37066 00004026 803E[0347]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?

 37077 00004039 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37078 0000403A C3                              retn			;

 37083                                  ;
 37084                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37085                                  ;
 37086                                  ;   INPUT
 37087                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37088                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37089                                  ;
 37090                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37091                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37092                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37093                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37094                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37095                                  ;
 37096                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37097                                  ;       AX
 37098                                  ;
 37099                                  ;   NOTES
 37100                                  ;       None
 37101                                  ;
 37102                                  ;   HISTORY
 37103                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37104                                  ;
 37105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37106                                  
 37107                                  skip_token:
 37108 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37109 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37110 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37111 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37112                                  skip_check_eol:
 37113 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37114 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37115 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37116 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37117 0000404D F8                              clc
 37118                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37119 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37120                                  skip_token_eol:
 37121 0000404F F9                              stc
 37122                                  skip_token_done:
 37123 00004050 C3                              retn
 37124                                  
 37125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37126                                  ;
 37127                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37128                                  ;
 37129                                  ;   INPUT
 37130                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37131                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37132                                  ;
 37133                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37134                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37135                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37136                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37137                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37138                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37139                                  ;
 37140                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37141                                  ;       AX
 37142                                  ;
 37143                                  ;   NOTES
 37144                                  ;       None
 37145                                  ;
 37146                                  ;   HISTORY
 37147                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37148                                  ;
 37149                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37150                                  
 37151                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37152 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37153 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37154 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37155 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37156 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37157 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37158                                  
 37159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37160                                  ;
 37161                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37162                                  ;
 37163                                  ;   INPUT
 37164                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37165                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37166                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37167                                  ;
 37168                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37169                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37170                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37171                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37172                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37173                                  ;
 37174                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37175                                  ;       AX
 37176                                  ;
 37177                                  ;   NOTES
 37178                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37179                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37180                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37181                                  ;
 37182                                  ;   HISTORY
 37183                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37184                                  ;
 37185                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37186                                  
 37187                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37188                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37189                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37190                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37191                                       
 37192                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37193                                  
 37194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37195                                  ;
 37196                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37197                                  ;
 37198                                  ;   INPUT
 37199                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37200                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37201                                  ;
 37202                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37203                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37204                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37205                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37206                                  ;
 37207                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37208                                  ;       AX
 37209                                  ;
 37210                                  ;   NOTES
 37211                                  ;       None
 37212                                  ;
 37213                                  ;   HISTORY
 37214                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37215                                  ;
 37216                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37217                                  
 37218                                  skip_line:
 37219 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37220 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37221                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37222 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37223 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37224                                  skip_line_done:
 37225                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37226 00004069 C3                              retn
 37227                                  
 37228                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37229                                  ;
 37230                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37231                                  ;
 37232                                  ;   INPUT
 37233                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37234                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37235                                  ;
 37236                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37237                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37238                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37239                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37240                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37241                                  ;
 37242                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37243                                  ;       AX
 37244                                  ;
 37245                                  ;   NOTES
 37246                                  ;       None
 37247                                  ;
 37248                                  ;   HISTORY
 37249                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37250                                  ;
 37251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37252                                  
 37253                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37254                                  
 37255                                  get_number:
 37256 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37257                                  num_loop:
 37258 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37259 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37260 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37261 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37262 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37263 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37264 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37265 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37266 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37267 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37268 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37269 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37270 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37271 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37272 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37273 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37274 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37275                                  
 37276                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37277                                  ;num_done:
 37278                                          ;retn
 37279                                  
 37280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37281                                  ;
 37282                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37283                                  ;
 37284                                  ;   INPUT
 37285                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37286                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37287                                  ;
 37288                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37289                                  ;       AL == next character
 37290                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37291                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37292                                  ;
 37293                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37294                                  ;       AX
 37295                                  ;
 37296                                  ;   NOTES
 37297                                  ;       None
 37298                                  ;
 37299                                  ;   HISTORY
 37300                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37301                                  ;
 37302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37303                                  
 37304                                  get_char:
 37305 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37306 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37307                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37308 00004090 26                      	es	
 37309 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37310 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37311 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37312                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37313 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37314                                  nearby_ret:
 37315 00004098 C3                              retn
 37316                                  
 37317                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37318                                  ;
 37319                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37320                                  ;
 37321                                  ;   INPUT
 37322                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37323                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37324                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37325                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37326                                  ;
 37327                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37328                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37329                                  ;
 37330                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37331                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37332                                  ;
 37333                                  ;   NOTES
 37334                                  ;       None
 37335                                  ;
 37336                                  ;   HISTORY
 37337                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37338                                  ;
 37339                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37340                                  
 37341                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37342                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37343                                  
 37344                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37345                                  query_user:
 37346 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37347                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37348 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37349 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37350                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37351                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37352                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37353                                  qu_1:
 37354 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37355 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37356 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37357 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37358 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37359 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37360 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37361                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37362 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37363                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37364                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37365                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37366                                  
 37367                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37368 000040B9 58                      	pop	ax
 37369 000040BA C3                      	retn
 37370                                  
 37371                                  query_all:
 37372                                  
 37373                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37374                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37375                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37376                                  
 37377 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37378 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37379 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37380 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37381                                  
 37382 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37383 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37384 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37385                                  find_match:                             ;
 37386 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37387 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37388 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37389 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37390 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37391 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37392 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37393                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37394 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37395                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37396 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37397 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37398 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37399                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37400 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37401 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37402 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37403 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37404 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37405 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37406 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37407 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37408 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37409                                  cmd_notset:
 37410 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37411                                  line_print:                             ;
 37412                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37413 000040F5 26                              es
 37414 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 37415 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37416 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37417 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37418                                  non_null:                               ;
 37419 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37420 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37421 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37422                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37423 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37424                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37425 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37426                                  non_space:                              ;
 37427 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37428 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37429 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37430 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37431                                  
 37432                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37433 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37434                                  
 37435                                  generic_prompt:
 37436 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37437                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37438 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37439 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37440 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37441 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37442 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37443 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37444 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 37445 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37446 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37447                                  not_func:
 37448 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37449 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37450 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37451 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37452 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37453 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37454 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37455 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37456 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37457 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37458 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37459                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37460 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37461 00004151 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37462                                  
 37463 00004152 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37464 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37465                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37466 00004158 F8                      	clc
 37467                                  do_cmd:
 37468 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37469                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37470                                  	; cf=0
 37471                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37472 0000415A C3                      	retn
 37473                                  
 37474                                  skip_cmd:
 37475 0000415B 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37476                                  skip_all:
 37477 0000415C B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37478 0000415E F9                      	stc
 37479 0000415F C3                      	retn

 37538                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37539                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables

 37541                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.

 37761

 37766                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether

 37904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37905                                  ;
 37906                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37907                                  ;
 37908                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37909                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37910                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37911                                  ;
 37912                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37913                                  
 37914                                  getnum:
 37915 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 37916 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37917                                  b2:
 37918 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37919 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37920                                  
 37921 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37922 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37923                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37924                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37925 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37926 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37927 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37928 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37929 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37930 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37931                                  
 37932 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37933                                  
 37934 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 37935 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37936 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37937 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37938 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37939 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37940 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37941 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 37942 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37943 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 37944 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37945                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37946                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37947                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37948                                  	;nop
 37949 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 37950 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37951 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 37952 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37953 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 37954 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37955 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37956                                  b15:
 37957 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37958 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37959                                  b1:
 37960 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37961 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37962 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 37963 00004330 C3                      	retn
 37964                                  badnum:
 37965                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37966                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37967 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37968                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37969 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37970 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 37971 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37972 00004339 C3                      	retn
 37973                                  
 37974                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37975                                  
 37976                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37977                                  
 37978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37979                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37980                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37981                                  ;	si = 0
 37982                                  ;	ax = country id
 37983                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37984                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37985                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37986                                  ;
 37987                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37988                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37989                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37990                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37991                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37992                                  
 37993                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37994                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 37995                                  
 37996                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37997                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 37998                                  
 37999 0000433A 57                      	push	di
 38000 0000433B 50                      	push	ax
 38001 0000433C 52                      	push	dx
 38002                                  
 38003 0000433D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38004 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38005 00004341 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38006 00004344 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38007 00004347 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38008                                  
 38009 00004349 06                      	push	es
 38010 0000434A 56                      	push	si
 38011                                  
 38012 0000434B 0E                      	push	cs
 38013 0000434C 07                      	pop	es
 38014                                  
 38015 0000434D BF[9E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38016 00004350 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature

 38239                                  getcountrydestination:
 38240                                  
 38241                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38242                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38243                                  ;
 38244                                  ;input: al - data id
 38245                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38246                                  ;on return:
 38247                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38248                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38250                                  
 38251                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38252                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38253                                  
 38254                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38255                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)

 38310                                  
 38311                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38312                                  
 38313                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38314                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38315                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38316                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38317                                  ;
 38318                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38319                                  ;	 be moved.
 38320                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38321                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38322                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38323                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38324                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38325                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38327                                  
 38328 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38329 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38330 0000448E F9                      	stc
 38331 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38332 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38333 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38334                                  
 38335 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38336 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38337 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38338 0000449A F9                      	stc
 38339 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38340                                  ricb_exit:
 38341 0000449D C3                      	retn

 38345                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38346                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38347                                  %if 0
 38348                                  
 38349                                  set_country_path:
 38350                                  
 38351                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38352                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38353                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38354                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38355                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38356                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38357                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38358                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38359                                  
 38360                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38361                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38362                                  
 38363                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38364                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38365                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38366                                  
 38367                                  	push	si
 38368                                  
 38369                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38370                                  	push	es
 38371                                  	pop	ds
 38372                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38373                                  
 38374                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38375                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38376                                  
 38377                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38378                                  	inc	si
 38379                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38380                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38381                                  
 38382                                  scp_default_drv:
 38383                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38384                                  	int	21h
 38385                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38386                                  
 38387                                  scp_setdrv:
 38388                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38389                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38390                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38391                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38392                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38393                                  
 38394                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38395                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38396                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38397                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38398                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38399                                  
 38400                                  scp_root_dir:
 38401                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38402                                  scp_path:
 38403                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38404                                  
 38405                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38406                                  scpath_exit:
 38407                                  
 38408                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38409                                  	push	es
 38410                                  	pop	ds
 38411                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38412                                  
 38413                                  	pop	si
 38414                                  	retn
 38415                                  
 38416                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38417                                  
 38418                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38419                                  
 38420                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38421                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38422                                  ;carry set if not.
 38423                                  
 38424                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38425                                  
 38426                                  	push	ax
 38427                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38428                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38429                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38430                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38431                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38432                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38433                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38434                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38435                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38436                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38437                                  
 38438                                  cdletter_no:
 38439                                  	stc
 38440                                  cdletter_exit:
 38441                                  	pop	ax
 38442                                  	retn
 38443                                  
 38444                                  %endif

 38454                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38455                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)

 38516                                  
 38517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38518                                  
 38519                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 38520                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 38521                                  
 38522                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38523                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 38524                                  open_dev:
 38525 000044D6 E80500                  	call	open_file
 38526 000044D9 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 38527                                  
 38528                                  open_dev1:
 38529 000044DB BA[3F45]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 38530                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38531                                  	;call	open_file
 38532                                  ;of_retn:
 38533                                  	;retn
 38534                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38535                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 38536                                  open_file:
 38537 000044DE B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 38538 000044E0 F9                      	stc
 38539 000044E1 CD21                    	int	21h
 38540                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 38541 000044E3 C3                      	retn
 38542                                  
 38543                                  open_dev3:
 38544 000044E4 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 38545                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 38546                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 38547                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 38548                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38549                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 38550                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 38551                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38552 000044E6 B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 38553                                  
 38554 000044E9 CD21                    	int	21h
 38555                                  
 38556 000044EB F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 38557 000044EE 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 38558                                  
 38559 000044F0 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 38560 000044F2 CD21                    	int	21h
 38561 000044F4 EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 38562                                  
 38563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38564                                  
 38565                                  ; 18/12/2022
 38566                                  %if 0
 38567                                  open_file:
 38568                                  	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 38569                                  	stc
 38570                                  	int	21h
 38571                                  	retn
 38572                                  %endif
